node.sales_desc: Flat tires and punctures can happen at anytime, on the pavement or off road. To meet customer demand for a simple, easy to operate and install aftermarket Tire Pressure Monitoring System, ARB has partnered with a leading Global TPMS manufacturer to supply both an external and internal kit.

node.sales_desc: This product is made of high-quality materials to serve you for years to come. Designed using state-of-the-art technology and with customers in mind. It will meet your needs and deliver great quality at an affordable cost.

It will meet your needs and deliver great quality at an affordable cost. node.long_desc: 34 inch Wide;Aluminum Finish;Universal Fitment;Single Lid;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Westins new Brute Trailer Tongue Box provides you with the ultimate storage box for your trailer. Featuring a .100 thick aluminum diamond-tread reinforced construction, the brute trailer tongue box allows you to effectively manage storage space on your trailer. Being built from aluminum, the boxes are 53 percent lighter than a steel tool box with similar dimensions. Each trailer tongue box features a top loading, stainless steel lock and an innovative gutter system to keep water out."

node.display_name: Wilco Offroad Race Can Strap and Mount
node.long_desc: Firmly Secures Race Can to Mounting Tray;Durable Nylon Strap With Steel Fasteners;Black Finish;Easy Installation;Sold Individually;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Maintain the utility of your reserve fuel mount with the Wilco Offroad Race Can Strap. Extra fuel is must for off-road emergencies and extended missions or adventures on the trail. Keep your fuel secure with a new can strap. Your back up fuel is a lifesaver in a pinch. Make sure you gas rests firmly in place with a replacement Wilco Offroad Race Can Strap.

node.display_name: ARB 4x4 Accessories Air Filter Relocation Kit
node.long_desc: Nickel plated brass fittings;1.2m rubber hose;Filter mounting bracket and all the necessary mounting screws included;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Where an ARB CKM series compressor is mounted on a vehicle and may be submersed during water crossings, this kit allows relocation of the air filter to above the waterline. This kit can also be used where the compressor is mounted in hot or dusty environments, to relocate the air filter to a position that allows intake of cool, clean air

node.display_name: ARB 4x4 Accessories Air Compressor Mounting BracketÂ
node.long_desc: The compressor bracket allows you to install a ARB CKMTA (twin) with manifold kit, CKMA (single) or CKSA (locker only) compressor in the rear left hand side fender well of a 2016-current Toyota Tacoma.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Mounting ARB compressors in modern day vehicles becomes a greater challenge because engine bays in today's vehicles don't allow much room for added accessories. To address this, ARB has introduced an engineered, reliable, quality bracketing system to properly integrate your ARB Air Compressor.

node.long_desc: Blister protection;Increased comfort;Vibration reduction;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: PalmSavers are designed to add increased comfort and protection to the palm of your hands. PalmSavers fit underneath your gloves and do not bunch up. They are designed to decreasd vibration onto your hands and help prevent calluses and bliseters. They are sold in a set of two.

node.long_desc: No drilling or cutting required;Direct connect wiring harnesses;Stereo kits bolt to factory attachment points;Systems are Element Ready to withstand harsh outdoor environment;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Whether hitting the dunes or the trails, you are sure to be the center of attention of any get-together. Rockford Fosgate has many stereo kit options availabel for your ride, or add-on speaker kits to complete your audio system!

node.long_desc: Fits any vehicle with coils measuring up to 3.0 inches in diameter;Shock protection;Coil protection;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Coil Savers are a unique design that features quick and easy installation without the hassle of removing your shocks from your car. Coil Savers are available in two sizes: '2.0 to 2.5' and 2.5 to 3.0'. They are only available in black and come as a set of two.

node.long_desc: Dual protection;Emergency back up CV boot repair;Easy installation;Superior strength;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: CV Savers are an innovative design that feature quick and easy installation over your existing CV joint boot. The CV Savers act as an additional boot for dual protection, or can be used as an emergency back up, and can be easily stored in your tool bag. They come with zip-ties to aid in installation. CV Savers are available in three sizes that fits most Side by Side Cars, Cars, Jeeps and Trucks. They are only available in black and come as a set of two.

node.long_desc: Custom fit sleeves fit around your sport bar;Black Diamond Tonneau covers are made of heavy duty sail cloth-Exclusive!;Designed to easily attach to a MasterTop Wind Stopper with an easy attach zipper;Protects cargo from wandering eyes and light showers;Not completely waterproof;3 year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Complete the summer accessory package with a MasterTop Tonneau cover. These custom rear vehicle covers protect your belongings from the weather and keep your valuables out of sight from prying eyes. Constructed of Durable original equipment approved fabric, each Tonneau is custom fit for your Jeep and features sport bar sleeves that secure around the sport bar. Though not completely waterproof, these durable rear vehicle covers attach to your factory belt rail/tailgate bar system and fits over your soft top hardware on 87-06 Wrangler models (will not fit 87-06 Wrangler hardtop only vehicles). Each MasterTop Tonneau incorporates a front facing zipper attachment for use with a MasterTop Wind Stopper to create the ultimate summer soft goods combo. All MasterTop Black Diamond Tonneau Covers use up-graded 28 oz Sail Cloth fabric for the ultimate in durability and great looks. This is a MasterTop exclusive feature found in no other aftermarket summer soft top! Why MasterTop Tonneau Covers? In this highly competitive category, other manufacturers have reduced the quality of the fabric and designs to the point where it is almost impossible to find a Summer Accessory made with the original equipment approved fabric. In an effort to reduce cost (and unfortunately, quality), manufacturers have all gone to an imported very low grade of fabric. This inferior fabric does not match your soft top, rips easier and has inconsistent color and textures. At MasterTop we continue to provide the products with the quality you have come to expect from a premium manufacturer. We use only original equipment approved fabrics in our summer soft goods (excluding Sun Stop Mesh Products) to ensure you only get the best product available."

node.display_name: MasterTop ShadeMaker Mesh Rear Cargo Tops
node.long_desc: Protects the rear passengers/cargo area from the sun;Easy no drill installation;Tough, dense mesh fabric is extremely durable;Available in red or black mesh;3 year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Need more protection from the sun than a ShadeMaker Bimini Top? Add a Master Top Mesh Rear Cargo Top to your vehicle. These easy to install back of vehicle tops attach to the rear sport bars of your Jeep with straps and buckles providing protection from the sun for your rear cargo and the rear seat occupants. No header channel or tools required to install! ShadeMaker Cargo Tops are constructed of extra durable commercial grade mesh fabric originally developed for over the road trucks to protect cargo from flying out of the cargo space. The added benefit of this durable mesh is its ability to block up to 70% of the sun's harmful UV rays. All ShadeMaker Mesh tops encapsulate heavy duty webbing on the edges to provide the most durable attachment points found in any mesh top design. Available in both black and red mesh, these tops are a must for any Jeep owner.

node.long_desc: Required for Bimini Top and Bimini top Plus installation;JK applications: pre-assembled design for ease of installation;CJ/YJ applications: pre-drilled channel makes for easy install;Custom fit design for tight, noise free fit;3 year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: All MasterTop Bimini tops and Bimini Top plus Tops require a tight fitting windshield Channel for proper attachment. MasterTop Windshield Channels are the perfect solution as they are pre-drilled to fit into the factory windshield mount holes. Each two-piece channel comes with all required hardware and are powder coat painted for long life. Designed to achieve a weather tight fit, the MasterTop Windshield Channel has the quality and ease of installation you demand.

node.long_desc: MasterTop's Spare Tire Covers are available in sizes 28 through 33 inches;These tire covers are custom designed for a great fit;Match all other MasterTop soft accessories with MasterTop tire covers;Completes the look of your Summer accessory equipped Jeep;3 year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Dress up your Jeep with a new matching Tire Cover from MasterTop. All MasterTop tire covers are custom tailored to match your original equipment soft top or all MasterTop soft tops and summer accessories. Constructed of vinyl coated non-woven backed soft top material with durable elastic binding, these easy to install tire covers simply slip over your spare tire, updating the look of your Jeep. Available in multiple sizes and colors, this is a must for all Jeep spare tires. To make sure you get the right sized tire cover, simply measure the middle diameter of your spare tire and pick the size from the applications below.

node.long_desc: This kit may require the use of a 5/8 engine spacer for proper fan shroud clearance when used with a 1" body lift;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: This kit may require the use of a 5/8 engine spacer for proper fan shroud clearance when used with a 1" body lift"

node.display_name: Tuff Country Replacement Uni-Ball and Snap Ring Kit
ARB 4x4 Accessories LINX Vehicle Accessory Interface
node.long_desc: LINX comes with six (6) pre-installed modules: Front and Rear Traction, Compressor Control, Accessory Switchboard, Battery Monitor, Speedometer, and Air Suspension Control;;On/Off activation of compressor;No additional inflator or deflator gauge required;Input desired pressure to inflate/deflate tires;Pressure shown in real time when compressor and hose are connected;Air flow shuts off automatically when target pressure is reached;User selectable maximum pressure for safety;Controls up to six (6) additional accessories; Can be switched on or off manually or automatically when the ignition, high beam, low beam or reverse lights are turned on;Each accessory name can be customized;Each accessory can have a user selectable low voltage cut-out;Can be viewed in either split or full screen mode;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
A unique modern controller that declutters the dashboard and centralizes the command of vehicle accessories by replacing classic switches, gauges and monitors with one sleek and smart driver interface. Built on an expandable platform, LINX will continue to evolve your on and off road driving experience both now and into the future.
Enhancing a modern 4x4 with a range of accessories, such as driving lights, Air Lockers, dual batteries and air compressors can quickly lead to a dash full of out of place, hard to reach switches and a myriad of gauges and monitors either stuck to the windshield or drilled into the dashboard, not to mention all the associated fuses and wiring systems.
LINX offers a single point of control via its user friendly, Bluetooth enabled, touchscreen display. The LINX display mounts conveniently and unobtrusively within reach of the driver while the main control hub lies neatly out of sight subsequently cleaning the look of your dashboard.
LINX comes with six (6) pre-installed modules: Front and Rear Traction, Compressor Control, Accessory Switchboard, Battery Monitor, Speedometer, and Air Suspension Control.

node.long_desc: 4 tools in 1;Fits in most 2-inch receivers;Smooth black finish;3-year warranty on finish;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Backbone is a 4-1 tool featuring skid plate, wheel chock, recovery point and non-skid step. Easily installs into most 2 receivers."
Direct OE replacement Jeep parts and accessories built to the original specifications by Omix-ADA. Limited five year manufacturer's warranty.

XD wheels rip through limits. They thrive on the dirt and chaos of extra-duty, off-road racing. They are built for those who need precise equipment for an imprecise environment. Light- weight, strong, and race-tested, these wheels are always looking to take on the next challenge.

Slim and sleek concave nine spoke design with billet center cap perfect for the import owner that refuses to drive on stock wheels. The machined lip gives the MR138 that classic two piece wheel look. Available in satin black, hyper gray and gold with machined lip available in 17 19"."

Moto Metal builds wheels that are of the highest quality available. Motocross inspired with style and quality like no other. Fast becoming one of the most popular line of wheels for Trucks and SUV's. Hubcentric Ring included where applicable.

KMC wheels Like no other". KMC rims are in a League of their own. A must see line of wheels. Every style has enormous detail, you get what you pay for and with KMC wheels, its evident. We truly love selling these beautiful styles from KMC wheels. KMC Produces some of the hottest wheels on the market. Be sure to check out the wide variety of styles and sizes they have to offer. Hubcentric Ring included where applicable."

The MR137 is for the minimalist looking for a five spoke, flat-face wheel that displays understated strength and presence. Get the look of two-piece construction with a stepped lip and raised wheel face - a fresh look without an empty wallet. You have the choice of Hyper Silver or Satin Black finishes.

Features:
- Five spoke, flat face, retro step lip design
- Raised wheel face mimics two piece construction
- Billet center cap
- Motegi M cast into spoke"

Clean, sleek, and bold, the MR136 utilizes Flow Formed Technology with excellent strength to weight ratio. The classic tapered six spoke design has a stepped lip for a little retro flair. The flat-face spoke orientation also contributes to its throwback aesthetic. Available in Hyper Silver and Satin Black finish.

Features:
- Six spoke, flat-face, retro step lip design
- Raised wheel face mimics two-piece construction
- Billet center cap
- Motegi M" cast into spoke
- Flow Forged Technology for optimum strength to weight ratio

Flow Form Technology is a unique casting process that combines the strength and weight savings of a forged wheel, with the cost savings of a cast wheel."

node.long_desc: Fits with or without trail rail system;Movable truck bed divider system;Can be positioned every 3 along the sides of the bed to manage and contain lightweight cargo;Works with Armis Retractable Bed Cover;Ideal solution to keep your cargo in check;Controlled at a single location on the driver's side;Quickly unlocked by simply squeezing the contoured lever;Glides along the bed rails smoothly and can be easily secured into positio;Built-in anchor points;Flip-up feature that allows you to store the divider in a horizontal position;Easily removable in seconds"
node.sales_desc: The Armis Cargo Manager is a movable truck bed divider system that can be positioned every 3 along the sides of the bed to manage and contain lightweight cargo. An innovative and essential companion to any Armis Retractable Bed Cover, the Cargo Manager is an ideal solution for Gladiator owners who want to keep their cargo in check, especially when the terrain gets tough. This bed divider is controlled at a single location on the driver's side, and is quickly unlocked by simply squeezing the contoured lever. Once unlocked, it glides along the bed rails smoothly and can be easily secured into position to accommodate a variety of cargo sizes and shapes. Its versatile design makes it the ultimate bed accessory, with built-in anchor points and a flip-up feature that allows you to store the divider in a horizontal position, up and out of the way. Or easily remove the Cargo Manager to make room for oversized loads, in just seconds."

node.display_name: Motive Gear GM 14 Bolt 10.5in. Thick 4.56 Ratio
Motive Gear GM 14 Bolt 10.5in. Thick 4.88 Ratio
Motive Gear GM 14 Bolt 10.5in. Thick 5.13 Ratio

node.long_desc: Universal application;Provides a stable and adjustable method of securing your smartphone or mobile device;Designed to work with the Rugged Ridge Gear-Vise Dash Bar;Can also be used in a variety of other installation scenarios
node.sales_desc: When the pavement ends and the terrain gets harsh, never underestimate the importance of being in control. This universal phone mount is designed to provide a stable and adjustable method of securing your smartphone or mobile device for safer in-cab operation, allowing you to keep your eyes on the road and your hands up on the wheel. Designed to work in unison with the Rugged Ridge Gear-Vise Dash Bar (13551.36) in 18-Current Wrangler JL / Gladiator JT models, this universal phone mount can also be used in a variety of other installation scenarios.

node.long_desc: Constructed from heavy duty 14 gauge steel or aluminum;Under bed truck box style;Crown series single door profile;Single door design with lockable handles;Perfect extra storage under trailer or flatbed;Under bed mounting brackets for bed rails sold separately (PartNo: 2922112)
node.sales_desc: The BETTER BUILT Under Bed Truck Tool Box offers quick access to your equipment and tools under your trailer or flat bed. The gutter design and weather stripping help prevent the elements from getting inside the box. The T-handle lock provides security from would be thieves. The box is backed by a 1 year limited warranty.

node.long_desc: CURT Winch Mounting plate is easily attached to a receiver;Fits any 2x2" trailer receiver tube opening;Fits a variety of winches;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Fits any 2 x 2" trailer hitch receiver tube opening"

D8-4 Truck Front Brake Kits are designed for ultimate in braking torque and durability to fit inside of 15 to 16" rim. D8-4 four piston calipers are designed with forged billet aluminum bodies, stainless steel pistons and high-temperature seals. Kits are paired with a massive 12.19" x 1.25" rotor for maximum torque and thermal stability. Kits include, aluminum hat assemblies, brackets, hardware and Promatrix brake pads."

node.display_name: Wilwood Dynapro Lug Mount Rear Parking Brake Kits
node.sales_desc: These versions of DPL Pro-Series rear disc kits provides a complete solution for Bronco 65-77 rear axles with Big Ford flange and bearing. (normally: OE 11 inch diameter brakes and 3300 GVW.) Forged Billet Dynapro Lug Mount four piston calipers, 12.19 one-piece drum/rotors, and high friction pads provide optimized and balanced braking to compliment front big brake upgrades available for Bronco platform. The neatly hidden internal shoe system provides a clean installation with superior static holding power for parking. Optional caliper finishes and rotor designs enable the builder to personalize the style and optimize brake performance for every individual application."

node.display_name: Wilwood Forged Dynapro 6 Big Brake Kits
node.long_desc: Available in red or black calipers;Available in various rotor diameters;Slotted or drilled and slotted rotors;Sold with left and right side
node.sales_desc: The enhanced brake capacity and pad performance of the DynaPro 6 forged billet six-piston caliper is combined with 11.75 diameter rotors for the popular Ford Bronco vehicles. These kits are the perfect complement to wheel, tire, and suspension upgrades on daily drivers or competition vehicles. Each kit is engineered vehicle specific and utilizes the existing hub assembly. Optional caliper finishes enable the builder to personalize the style and optimize brake performance for every individual application."

node.display_name: Wilwood Forged Narrow Superlite 6R Big Brake Kits
node.long_desc: Available in red or black calipers;Available in various rotor diameters;Slotted or drilled and slotted rotors;Sold with left and right side
node.sales_desc: The unsurpassed braking capacity of the Forged Narrow Superlite 6R six-piston caliper serves as the base of this group of 13-14" big rotor kits for these popular late model vehicles. FNSL6R kits are engineered application specific for simplified installation and full compatibility with OE master cylinder output and ABS functions where used. Big brake kits provide increased brake capacity and complimentary style with wheel, tire, and suspension upgrades on high performance street/off-road machines. Optional caliper finishes and rotor designs simplify personalizing the style and braking requirements of any application."

node.long_desc: Available in red or black calipers;Available in various rotor diameters;Slotted or drilled and slotted rotors;Sold with left and right side
node.sales_desc: AERO6 calipers were designed for the specific purpose of providing big capacity braking with large diameter rotors for heavy weight and extreme duty vehicles. For cars, it's the biggest of the big providing big brake performance for show and dual purpose street and track vehicles. For trucks and SUV's, it provides big stopping power for towing, off-road, and enhanced braking with wheel and tire upgrades. Kits listed for specific vehicles are fully compatible with OE master cylinder output and ABS function. Direction staggered vane 14 rotors provide maximum cooling for sustained high heat durability."

node.long_desc: Available in red or black calipers;Available in various rotor diameters;Slotted or drilled and slotted rotors;Sold with left and right side
node.sales_desc: Wilwood's Tactical Extreme TX6R Big Brake kits are ultimate in braking performance for Truck, SUV and Armored Vehicles. Using TX6R radial mount six-piston calipers and massive 15.00 to 16.00" GT-60 directional vane Spec-37 alloy rotors, these kits deliver consistent stopping power and extreme duty durability under sustained high heat with this ready to bolt-on kit. The calipers are volume matched for compatibility with original equipment power brake system output. Kits include radial mount caliper brackets, and all the necessary hardware to complete the installation. Braided stainless steel flex lines will need to be purchased for some applications."

node.display_name: Wilwood Forged Narrow Superlite 4R Big Brake Kits
node.long_desc: Available in red or black calipers;Available in various rotor diameters;Slotted or drilled and slotted rotors;Sold with left and right side
node.sales_desc: Forged Narrow Superlite 4R four piston calipers are combined with BP-10 compound pads and 13-14" rotors in this group of big brake kits for custom high performance street and show machines. This group of specialized kits for cars, trucks, and SUV's retain full use of the OE parking brake, master cylinder output, and ABS where used. FNSL4R rear kits provide complimentary style and performance with 13" and larger front brake upgrades in conjunction with wheel, tire, and suspension upgrades. Optional caliper finishes and rotor designs enable the builder to match style and performance on all applications."

Designed for the industry's best, by the industry's best. Motegi has earned the trust of some of the most discerning critics in the aftermarket automotive industry. That trust is what Motegi Wheels is founded on.

node.long_desc: Available in red or black calipers;Available in various rotor diameters;Slotted or drilled and slotted rotors;Sold with left and right side
node.sales_desc: AERO4 Big Brake rear axle kits replace the factory disc brakes and use the OE parking brake assembly as a compliment to front big brake upgrades on late model trucks and SUV's. High capacity braking from the AERO4 calipers, BP-10 compound pads, and oversized rotors are matched to the OE master cylinder output, ABS function, and individual vehicle bias requirements. Enhanced brake performance, increased durability, and high-tech style compliment big wheel, tire, and suspension upgrades on customized vehicles, tow rigs, and all others with increased brake requirements from high GVW.

node.long_desc: Available in red or black calipers;Available in various rotor diameters;Slotted or drilled and slotted rotors;Sold with left and right side
node.sales_desc: TC6R calipers are purpose built to provide unsurpassed braking capacity on trucks and SUV's using 20 and larger wheels and tires. Combining the high clamping efficiency of the TC6R caliper with 16" diameter directional vane rotors and high friction BP-10 compound brake pads, TC6R kits provide the braking power necessary to control the higher rotating weight of ultra-sized wheels and tires, especially with high GVW vehicles and vehicles used for towing. TC6R kits are engineer application to be fully compatible with the OE master cylinder output and retain full function of the ABS system."

node.display_name: Wilwood D154 Rear Parking Brake Kits
node.long_desc: Available in red or black calipers;Available in various rotor diameters;Slotted or drilled and slotted rotors;Sold with left and right side
node.sales_desc: The D154 Pro Series rear disc conversion kit with integral parking brake provides high-tech styling for the street and rugged durability for the toughest off-road conditions. Experience big brake stopping power from 12.19 diameter rotors and two-piston floating mount calipers for ultimate control with big wheel and tire packages. This kit covers the full range of non-ABS Dana 35 rear axles used over a wide range of Jeep models and feature bolt-on installation and full compatibility with the OE master cylinder output. The neatly hidden internal shoe system provides a clean installation with superior static holding power for parking. D154 rear caliper kits offer a complimentary match to vehicles using Wilwood D52 or D154 calipers on OE or aftermarket spindles. Optional caliper finishes and rotor designs enable the builder to personalize the style and optimize brake performance."

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Transfer Case Mounted Parking Brake Kits
node.long_desc: Heavy duty TIG-welded bracketry needed for caliper installation;Bracket needed for re-routing of factory e-brake cable (Uses Factory Cable);Grade 8.8 or higher hardware;Includes bolts for both early and late Samurai flange hole and pattern sizes (8mm and 10mm);Brake disk;Bi-color zinc plated for corrosion resistance
node.sales_desc:
Suzuki Samurais usually have a problem once you put on disk brakes- They have no parking brake. This solves that issue by adding a mechanical spot caliper to the back half of the Transfer Case.

Low Range Off Road designed and manufactured this after Spidertrax discontinued their E-Brake Kit. We were sad to see their's go after so many years, but we looked at ways that we could improve on the design

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Axle Truss Kits
node.long_desc: Front axle truss/gusset kit;With LR logo;Comes with upper truss, and 2 lower knuckle ball gusset
node.sales_desc:
Samurai owners know that one of the weakest spots on their vehicle is the front axle. The axle is suceptable to bending or warping, causing the alignment to wear tires, and the front axle components to prematurely fail. If you plan on any off road usage, we recommend to truss your axle with our truss and gusset kit. This is a must for all those who are planning on doing a spring over axle swap or aftermarket suspension and tire upgrades.

The factory engineers didn't plan on us putting these little things through so much abuse, that is why we make them stronger than factory... so they can take the beating and have no ill-effects from our punishment...plus, when welded to the axle it looks plain trick!

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Rocker Rod Screw Set
node.long_desc: SOld in sets;Stronger and more durable than OEM screws;Use hex socket heads instead of phillips heads;Easy to install
node.sales_desc: We quickly lost count of how many tech calls we have recieved from customers with broken rocker arm screws stuck in the rocker shaft. It's a common cause of frustration when rebuilding a Samurai 1.3L engine. The phillips head screws used by the factory are simply not strong enough to remove without snapping apart. Often a screw extractor can retrieve the broken portion of the screw so that the shaft can be removed from the head though sometimes the entire shaft needs to be replaced.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Oil Pump Bolt Kit
node.long_desc: Bolt kit only;Oil pump bolts with OE style JIS heads;Lower stud nuts;Easy installation
node.sales_desc: You don't have to reuse your old hardware when installing your new oil pump.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Door Limiter Straps
node.long_desc: Longer, 4-position adjustable;Use one of the four sewn loops in the strap to set the desired limit;Provides longer strap clearance
node.sales_desc: If your door straps have lost their fight with the Sun's UV rays (i.e. they frayed and broke), replace them with these longer, 4-position adjustable Door Travel Limiter Straps from Low Range Off-Road! Use one of the four sewn loops in the strap to set the desired limit. Whether you want to make your doors open a little farther or you need longer strap clearance for a roll cage, this kit is the solution.

node.display_name: Low Range Offroad Timing Cover Bolt Kit
node.long_desc: Engine specific;Complete timing cover bolt kit;Fits like OEM
node.sales_desc: Having a hard time finding the right timing cover bolts ? Low Range has them available now in kits so that you don't have to go and hunt them down. This is an inexpensive kit compared to the time it takes to find the right hardware... if you can even find it. Many of the Timing Cover breakages we have seen come from ill-fastened covers- either too tight, not tight enough or missing the hardware and rubbing on some rotating component.

node.long_desc: Overall Diameter range of 32 to 37 inch tall tires;Rim Range of 17 to 20 inch diameter;Black Sidewall;Tread Type: Hybrid Terrain;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Ridge Grappler represents the next generation of the Nitto Grappler family of products which provides the best of both worlds from our mud-terrain and all-terrain product offerings. Featuring a revolutionary dynamic hybrid tread pattern, the Ridge Grappler provides a quiet and comfortable ride while the deep, aggressive sidewall lugs and tread pattern provide capable off-road performance.

node.long_desc: Compatibility - X3/ X3F/ X6/ X9/ S6000 Winches;4 Leads;Sold individually;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Superwinch replacement solenoids are the perfect match for any Superwinch setup. They are great to keep around for spares or to use when you need replacement parts.

For winches up to 16,000 lbs. capacity including the EX1, X1, X2, X3, UT3000, GP3000, S3000, and S4000 Series Winches.

node.sales_desc: This RT Off-Road Exhaust Spacer Kit is designed to move the front exhaust pipe down and back in order to avoid contact between the exhaust and front driveshaft.

node.display_name: RT Off-Road Trailer Hitch Pin and Clip
node.long_desc: Universal;OE style replacement;Constructed from steel;Backed by RT Off-Road's 12 month warranty;RT Off-Road Trailer Hitch Pin;Clip;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The RT Off-Road 5/8 inch Trailer Hitch Pin is an OE style replacement that will securely fasten the hitch to the receiver. This hitch pin is constructed from steel. It is backed by RT Off-Road's 12 month warranty.

node.long_desc: Universal;Made of Steel;Used with Steel Wheels;Hardware not required;Sold individually;Length: 4.00 inch;Width: 4.00 inch;Height: 4.00 inch;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: RT Off-Road's Hub Covers are designed for use with steel wheels. This hub cover slips in fromthe back of the wheel and hides the unsightly hub and hub nut.

node.long_desc: Includes black gauge panel with 4 black-faced gauges and wiring;Gauges include: Fuel Level, Coolant Temperature, Oil Pressure and Voltage;Clock not included ;These aftermarket gauges look different from OEM;Easy installation;Unplug old panel and plug in new panel Gauge Panel w/ Gauges;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Give your Jeep interior a functional facelift by adding one of RT Off-Road's gauge panels! Each heavy-duty plastic unit includes four easy-to-read analog gauges: fuel level, coolant temperature, oil pressure, and voltage. These gauge panels install quickly and easilyjust unplug the old panel and plug in the new one. That's all there is to it! A mounting bracket and wiring harness are included. Choose the color you prefer, and match your vehicle to the corresponding panel for precise fitment.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Kunene Gloss Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Kunene aftermarket wheel was created to give the SUV and Truck enthusiast a clean, sophisticated, yet sporty look. Kunene takes a classic sport mesh style and broadens up the spokes up to 24 inches tall. For the first time Black Rhino is offering a Matte Black with Dark Matte Tint sprayed over a Ball Milled edge that results in an almost Rose Gold finish. Other finishes includes Gloss Black and Gloss Silver with a Mirror Cut Face.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Kruger Silver with Mirror Cut Face Wheels
node.sales_desc:
You'll be ridin' high when you upgrade your sport truck or SUV with Black Rhino's new Kruger truck rims, available in 20, 22 and 24-inch diameters. For such large truck wheels, the Kruger design is light and sophisticated, with 9 pairs of narrow spokes radiating from the recessed hub to the very perimeter of the wheel. To cover a wide range trucks and SUVs, Kruger is available in both five and six-lug bolt patterns, including models to fit new the Chevy Colorado, GMC Canyon, Jeep Grand Cherokee and Dodge Durango.

For those looking to really set their city truck apart from the herd, Kruger's innovative finishes will be as important as the design itself. These durable and distinctive finishes include including gloss gunmetal, gloss black and silver with a mirror-cut face.

node.sales_desc:

node.display_name: Black Rhino Katavi Silver with Mirror Cut Face Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Katavi is new street style SUV/Truck wheel. The Katavi is a split six spoke with chamfers accenting each spoke. Each spoke moves with prowess to meet with a nice machine cut lip. Much like the luxurious Tanzanian national park in the Katavi Region of Africa, after which the wheel is named, the Katavi fits the bill of stylish mixed with the bold athletic look of our off road line; built for Trucks and SUV's and available in 20, 22", 24". Each Black Rhino wheel is engineered to carry the heavy loads often associated with Trucks and SUV's. All wheels are either hub-centric or supplied with centering rings to ensure a smooth vibration free ride."

node.display_name: Black Rhino Karoo Gloss Gunmetal Wheels
node.sales_desc: Karoo is sure to be a big hit with off highway tuners. It's one of the newest off road wheels from Black Rhino, a fresh new design that telegraphs both ruggedness and style. Seven cam-shaped spokes are deeply recessed in the wheels barrel, giving Karoo unique dimensionality. To cover the full range of stock and lifted off highway vehicles, Karoo off road rims are available in 17X8 18X8.5, 20x9.5, 22X10, and 24x10 sizes. Offsets range from 15mm to 52mm for five, and six lug bolt patterns. These truck rims sport huge lips to provide safe bead seating for oversized tires. Karoo truck wheels are featured in matte black, matte black with tinted machined face, and gloss gunmetal.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Karoo Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: Karoo is sure to be a big hit with off highway tuners. It's one of the newest off road wheels from Black Rhino, a fresh new design that telegraphs both ruggedness and style. Seven cam-shaped spokes are deeply recessed in the wheels barrel, giving Karoo unique dimensionality. node.sales_desc: PONDORA truck wheels by Black Rhino. The Pondora is a straight cut six spoke with a small step groove accenting each spoke. Each spoke moves with prowess to meet with a nice machine cut lip. Much like the luxurious wild gaming park Pondoro in South Africa, after which the wheel is named, the PONDORA fits the bill of classy with a touch of raw toughness. Built for Trucks and SUV's and available in 20,22",24" in Gloss Black with Machine Cut Lip, Silver with Machine Cut Face & Lip, Chrome. Each Black Rhino wheel is engineered to carry the heavy loads often associated with Trucks and SUV's. All wheels are either hub-centric or supplied with centering rings to ensure a smooth vibration free ride. PONDORA truck wheels by Black Rhino."

node.display_name: Black Rhino Rotorua Gloss Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Rotorua is built with maximum concave and aggressive stance in mind. Named after a northern city in New Zealand, the wheel draws inspiration from the island's unique truck culture. A race influenced multispoke aesthetic is broadened up and sharpened to fit the tough lines of UTE vehicles such as the Ford Ranger, Holden Colorado, Isuzu D-Max, Nissan Navara, and Toyota Hilux. Rotorua is built around vehicle specific brakes to offer maximum concavity and is also offered with different center cap options to accommodate protruding vehicle hubs. The aftermarket rim is available in 20x9.5, 18x9.5, and 17x9.5 in high and low offsets.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Revolution Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: You say you want a revolution? Black Rhino's got one for you. It's Black Rhino's new Revolution model off-road wheels for stock and lifted trucks and SUVs modified to go wherever your spirit takes you. Catering to the off highway coterie, Revolution truck rims are spec'd out with wheel offsets from -22mm to +12mm, and are engineered to stand up to all the punishment you can dole out. These truck wheels come in sizes that range from 17x9, 18x9, 20x9 to a whopping 20x10. Both 5 and 6-lug bolt patterns are supported. Big fat lips provide a solid bead seat for the oversized tires off roaders prefer. Revolution off-road rims feature a revolutionary array of finishes, including matte black, matte black with a matte machined lip edge gloss black with bright machined face.

The Black Rhino Rumble is a minimal six spoke wheel design following up on the popularity of the Black Rhino Boxer from 2018. The wheel has been designed by enthusiasts and made for enthusiasts of the Ford and Subaru off road rally racing genre. For the offroad overland Subaru vehicles such Crosstrek XV, Legacy, Impreza, Forester, Outback, and WRX, the wheel is offered in 15x7 and 16x7 sizes. An additional 17x8 size is also available for vehicles such as, but not limited to BRZ, Fiesta ST, Focus ST, FRS, STI, and WRX. For the first time, Black Rhino is introducing a new Olive Drab Green finish to complement three additional standard finishes; Gloss Gold, Olive Drab Green, Gunblack, and Bronze.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Rush Gloss Black with Milled Spokes Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Rush is a no-nonsense off-road truck and SUV wheel packed with features. Eight triangulated spokes are CNC milled for a tough industrialized finish and met with stainless steel bolts with a deep lip. Another new feature for 2018 is our flat center cap style, making this tough style aesthetically suitable for both on and off road stylings. Available sizes include 17x9.5, 18x9.5, 20x9.5 sizes in 5-lug and 6-lug PCD. Rush is exclusively available in Gloss Black with CNC milling and stainless bolts.

The Black Rhino Rumble is a minimal six spoke wheel design following up on the popularity of the Black Rhino Boxer from 2018. node.display_name: Black Rhino Roku Matte Bronze Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Roku is inspired from a classic race wheel epitomized by nostalgic tuners of the millennial generation. These nostalgic race times have now passed and are now evolving into the offroad overland truck and SUV culture. The Black Rhino Roku was made to bridge the gap of the evolving aftermarket trends to bring this once popularized compact race car look to the now tough, brawny, and bold world of trucks and SUVs. This lightweight off road rim is bulked up and modernized with smooth chamfers and a concave profile to complement any on or off road truck build. The Roku is available in a Matte Gun Black and Matte Bronze Metallic. Sizes include 20x9.5, 18x9.5, and 17x9.5, available in multiple offsets and 5 / 6 lug PCDs.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Rumble Olive Drab Green Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino Rumble is a minimal six spoke wheel design following up on the popularity of the Black Rhino Boxer from 2018. The wheel has been designed by enthusiasts and made for enthusiasts of the Ford and Subaru off road rally racing genre. For the offroad overland Subaru vehicles such Crosstrek XV, Legacy, Impreza, Forester, Outback, and WRX, the wheel is offered in 15x7 and 16x7 sizes. An additional 17x8 size is also available for vehicles such as, but not limited to BRZ, Fiesta ST, Focus ST, FRS, STI, and WRX. For the first time, Black Rhino is introducing a new Olive Drab Green finish to complement three additional standard finishes; Gloss Gold, Olive Drab Green, Gunblack, and Bronze.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Pinatubo Gloss Black with Milled Inside Window Wheels
node.sales_desc: Black Rhino introduces the new explosive Pinatubo wheel suitably named after one of the world's most eruptive volcanoes found on the Philippine islands. Eight beefy spokes explode from a deep center and crawls towards a brawny lip resulting in a massive crater like appearance. It is our deepest and most concave wheel to date! Along each spoke are deep trenches tactfully cut by CNC machining to set off the bold Gloss Black finish. The machining continues the the sidewalls of each spoke and is tastefully added to the edge of the lip. Sizes include 17x9.5, 18x9.5, 20x9.5, 20x12, and 22x12 available in 5, 6, and 8 lug PCD patterns.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Overland Matte Black Wheels
node.sales_desc: Overland embodies BlackRhino style with its multi layered mechanical features that strongly tie lip with its concavity that constructs into an ultra rugged looking custom wheel. It's a fresh take on the split five spoke design that is integrated with its outer bolted lip- showcasing both intricate ruggedness and precision style that define this brand. The hallowed five tongued forks are individually recessed in the right areas to give many dimensions that suit the most demanding styles of trucks. The Overland has unique dimensionality with these details combined with aggressive concave for the wider sizes. To cover the full range of stock and lifted off highway vehicles, Overland offroad rims are available in 17X8 , 17x9.5 ,18X8, 18x9.5, and 20x9.5 sizes. Offsets range from -18mm to+52mm for five, and six lug bolt patterns. These truck rims sport huge lips to provide safe bead seating for oversized tires. Overland truck wheels are featured in the classic stealth matte black.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Ocala Gloss Black with Milled Spoke Wheels
node.sales_desc: The Black Rhino truck and SUV wheels lineup is built with two types of vehicles in mind: The first set-up was built with a negative offset that works perfectly with your Truck or SUV with that Extreme lift. This provides your Off Road Beast with an aggressive stance that these vehicles demand. The second is your more street friendly vehicle that you want to give that stylish look to set it apart from all other vehicles. The wheels offset is more positive and will still allow you to use it on your vehicle with a mild lift or stock appearance. The wheels come in a variety of 17, 18", 20" 22" and 24" sizes in a variety of finishes - Gloss Gunmental, Matte Black w/Machine Face & Dark Matte Tint, Matte Black w/Matte Graphite Lip, Matte Black, Gloss Black with Machine, Matte Black with Matte Machine, 5, 6 and 8 Lug, all depending on what perfectly suits your Truck or SUV. So if you have a 12" lift with Dual Shocks or you have that aggressive Street Truck, Black Rhino Off Road Truck wheels and SUV wheels are the ones for you."

node.display_name: Black Rhino Razorback Matte Black with Machine Dark Tint Lip Wheels
node.sales_desc: Razorback is an imposing new set of aggressive offroad wheels for your set up . It's one of the newest off road wheels from Black Rhino, with a fresh concave design that shows a tough style with its mechanically chiselled lip combined with high end precision machined style. Ten angled spokes are deeply recessed in these custom offroad wheels chainsaw-like barrel, giving Razorback a high energy presence. To cover the full range of stock and lifted off highway vehicles, Razorback offroad rims are available in 17x9, 18x9, 20x9 and 20x12 sizes. Offsets range from -44 to 0mm for five, six and 8-lug bolt patterns, including a 8/180 pattern for newer GMC and Chevrolet trucks. These truck rims sport huge lips to provide safe bead seating for oversized tires. Razorback truck wheels are featured in matte black with a dark tint machined face.

node.display_name: Black Rhino Pismo Gloss Black with Milled Spokes Wheels
node.sales_desc: Pismo is sure to be a big hit with off highway tuners. It's one of the newest custom off road wheels from Black Rhino, a fresh new design that unique combines a sophisticated kind of ruggedness and style with its brightly contrasted milling within its split seven windows. This gives the Pismo a stunning first impression up to its outer lip edge that sports a geometrically pleasing inset that echoes nicely with a set of your favorite rugged tires. To cover the full range of stock and lifted off highway vehicles, Pismo off road rims are available in 17x9.5, 18x9.5, 20x9.5 ,20x12, and 22X12 sizes. Offsets range from -44mm to +6mm for five, and six bolt patterns. Pismo truck wheels are featured in one finish as sophisticated as the wheel design itself, including gloss black with precision milled spokes to accentuate the designs classic style.

H3R Performance Fire Extinguisher Mounts and Brackets
node.long_desc: H3R Performance extreme duty, quick release fiberglass-reinforced nylon brackets are designed to meet MIL SPEC 810G as well as to withstand inertial loads in excess of 27G;Minimize emergency response time with the quick release design and bright red pull-to-release strap;Made of corrosion-resistant hardware, they are an excellent mounting solution for off road and racing enthusiasts.;California Residents: WARNING"

No thermal shock to electronics;No mess or damage to vehicle or surfaces;Liquefied gas extinguishes hard-to-reach fires;Does not impair operator's vision;EPA approved;Listed and rated by Underwriters Laboratories;Rechargeable;Made in U.S.A.;USCG approved (with bracket listed on UL label, models of 5 lb. and larger);1 lb. to 5 lb. HalGuard extinguishers come standard with aviation-quality mounting brackets;High quality steel cylinders;All metal valve construction;Compact, lightweight, easy to use;Six year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
H3R Performance brings aviation style Halotron 1 fire extinguishers to the automotive enthusiast with HalGuard premium clean agent fire protection.

HalGuard is no ordinary automotive fire extinguisher. It contains Halotron 1, electrically non-conductive clean" extinguishing agent that rapidly turns into a gas. Halotron 1 has passed extensive testing by Underwriters Laboratories, and meets FAA requirements. It can be found on commercial aircraft, and is used by airport fire fighters and on the flight line.

Hand held HalGuard extinguishers are available in either compact 1.4 lb. and 2.5 lb. sizes, or larger 5 lb., 11 lb., and 15.5 lb. units. The larger sizes are USCG approved, and meet DOT requirements for the heavy duty truck market. 65 lb., and 150 lb. wheeled HalGuard extinguishers offer maximum clean agent protection for the pit lane or large facilities.

Whatever your passion; hot rods, racing cars, classic automobiles, off road vehicles, heavy duty trucks, or even RVs or boats - protect your investment with a fire extinguisher that attacks fires involving flammable liquids quickly and safely, with no danger of electric shock, and without leaving a damaging residue to clean up."

node.long_desc: Functional design for on and off-road;Sleek styling with increased departure angle for off-road;Direct bolt-on for easy installation;Manufactured from 1018 cold rolled steel;Accommodates factory proximity sensors;Recessed center step to accommodate up to 40-inch spare tire;Satin black powder coat finish;Structural tow points;Integrated street legal Rigid SR-M Series Pro Flush Mount light window and mounts (lights not included);Grade-8 hardware included
node.sales_desc:
The PRO76 Series Rear Bumper is manufactured from 1018 cold rolled steel designed to compliment factory body lines and allow for increased approach angles. It features a recessed center step to accommodate up to a 40-inch tire and fits perfectly above the tow hitch. Includes well placed light windows for flush mount style backup lights, accepts factory proximity sensors, structural tow points with sleek styling for increased ground clearance. Grade 8 hardware included.

Proudly made in the USA, the PRO76 Series Bumpers have everything you need from a Jeep bumper system to rage through your next adventure.

node.long_desc: Sleek styling with increased approach angle for off-road;Manufactured from 1018 cold rolled steel;Direct bolt-on for easy installation;Bolt-on skid plate for maximum protection;Integrated fog light mounts to accommodate various pod style lights;Built-in winch plate and fairlead mount;Air compressor mounting system included;Low profile bull bar for protection without compromising visibility;Structural tow points accept any popular D-ring or tow bar;Includes flat tow adapters;Satin black powder coat;Grade-8 hardware included;Optional PRO76 Front Skid Plate (PN# JS-JL-FS0) is direct bolt-on with integrated 20-inch light bar window and built-in mounts(skid plate and light bar not included);Made in the USA
node.sales_desc:
Created by 3-time King of the Hammers Champion, Jason Scherer, the PRO76 Series Bumpers are the most functional Jeep bumpers on the market offering solutions for the Jeep you haven't even thought of yet. The PRO76 Series Front Bumper is manufactured from 1018 cold rolled steel designed to compliment factory body lines and allow for increased approach angles. It includes an air compressor mount thoughtfully hidden inside the front bumper for practical access and providing a solution to the space issue found under the hood of the JL. It features built-in pod style light mounts, winch, and fairlead mounts to eliminate extra parts and adapters. Strong structural tow points for recovery and includes flat-tow adapter brackets offering versatile on-road use as well as superior off-road function.

The optional PRO76 Series Skid Plate (PN# JS-JL-FS0) direct bolts to the bumper, protecting and hiding the factory rails and features a 20-inch light bar window with built-in light mounts. Grade 8 hardware included. Proudly made in the USA, the PRO76 Series Bumpers have everything you need from a Jeep bumper system to rage through your next adventure.

node.display_name: Rigid Industries ADAPT LED Light Bars
node.long_desc: 8-Step Selectable Beam Pattern from 15-degrees to 90-degrees;Integrated Optic Design with Spot, Flood, and Driving Zones;Selectable RGB-W Accent Lighting with User-Configurable Colors;Active View Technology - Ability to Automatically Change Beam Pattern Based on Vehicle Speed;Molded RIGID Dash Controller Enables Instant Beam Pattern Changes and Includes Presets;Multiple Mounting Locations; Traditional Side Mounting or Underside Low-Profile Stealth Mount;Wiring Harness, Dash Controller, Under Dash Module, and Mounting Hardware Included;Impact-Resistant Polycarbonate Lens;Aluminum Heat Sink;Limited Lifetime Warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The RIGID Adapt LED Light Bars are the world's first off-road lighting products that can change instantly according to conditions. Adapt offers 8 selectable beam patterns that range from a 90 degree broad short-distance beam to a highly focused 15 degree long-distance spot beam in a single fixture. It also includes RIGID's new Active View Technology, which allows the beam pattern to actively adjust with vehicle speed. There are no moving parts within the Adapt. Instead, RIGID uses advanced LED technology and combines it with patented new optics to create a revolutionary lighting solution that can Adapt with changing conditions. Further, Adapt has built-in accent lighting that can be set to any color in the light spectrum, including white, for a custom look around town. The Adapt has a signature new look that is unlike any other light bar on the market, and it even has expanded mounting capabilities that include new base-mounting options in addition to traditional side mounts. Adapt LED light bars include a RIGID Dash Controller, which is a molded backlit dash-mounted unit that offers easy, intuitive control of Adapt's beam patterns, Adaptive Mode, accent lighting, and programmable presets. RIGID Adapt Light Bars are available in 10-inch to 50-inch lengths and include a RIGID Dash Controller, Under Dash Module, wiring harness, and mounting hardware. With the RIGID Adapt, it has never been easier to Own the Night.

Various U-joints used in Curry axle applications

node.long_desc: 1 liter (1.06 quart) bottle of non-synthetic Currie 85w-140, API GL-6 Racing Gear Oil;Premium petroleum-based racing-grade formula;Excellent thermal and shear stability;High shock load and extreme pressure chemistry;Extends the life of all drive components;Meets or exceeds: API GL-6;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
High-performance non-synthetic racing gear oil meets the API GL-6 specification and is designed specifically for the requirements of 9-inch gear assemblies. It provides maximum shear stability and extreme pressure protection required to extend the life of your Currie rearend.

9-Inch API GL-6 Requirement:
Due to the high-offset hypoid design (very high shear) of the 9-inch ring and pinion gears, a severe duty petroleum-based gear oil with API GL-6 specification is mandatory. The use of synthetic or GL-5 specification gear oils will result in premature wear of the gears and excess heat buildup that will damage internal components, voiding the Currie Warranty.

Oil Capacities:
The following are estimations of oil capacities for your new 9-inch and Currie axle assemblies. Extreme pinion angles, as well as aftermarket components (such as diff covers), may drastically change the unit's capacity.
Currie 9-inch ....................................2.84 liters / 3 qts
Currie F9 3 or 3.25 in. tube.................3.79 litres / 4 qts
Currie F9 3.5, 4 or 4.5 in. tube............4.73 liters / 5 qts
8 Ford.............................................2.37 liters / 2.5 qts
8.8 Ford..........................................2.37 liters / 2.5 qts
12 Bolt GM........................................2.37 liters / 2.5 qts
Currie 44 .........................................1.42 liters / 1.5 qts
Currie 44 .........................................1.89 liters / 2 qts
Currie 60 .........................................2.37 liters / 2.5 qts
Currie 70 .........................................2.84 liters / 3 qts

If you have a clutch-type limited-slip differential, a friction modifier additive must be used in addition to this oil."
Various types and brands of replacement brake rotors for Currie axles

node.long_desc: Encapsulated protection device for Tow-Pro Electric Brake Controllers;Sealed connections;Stop back-feed from interfering with the vehicle systems
node.sales_desc:
The REDARC Encapsulated Protection Devices for both 12 and 24V applications. It is totally encapsulated with sealed connections.

Designed to fit in the Trailer Stop Lamp feed to support the installation of Tow-Pro Electric Brake Controllers on vehicles where back-feed' of 12V (during Tow-Pro Manual Override) may interfere with the vehicle systems. When installed correctly, this ensures correct Trailer braking and Stop Lamp operation when the vehicle brakes or the Tow-Pro Manual Override is used.

node.long_desc: Mounting kit for Tow-Pro Elite;Mounts under the dash;Bracket can be bent if install requires
node.sales_desc:
The REDARC Tow-Pro Elite Mounting Kit simplifies the installation of the Tow-Pro Elite electric trailer brake controller main unit under the dash of a vehicle.

The bracket is designed to be fastened to the main unit with 2 x M4 bolts either at right angles, in-line or diagonally across the main unit. It also features an M6 slot and nut/bolt allowing connection to the vehicle on a suitable M6 stud or M6 hole.

The material of the bracket is rigid to support the main unit but can still be bent should the installation require it.

node.long_desc: Enables installation of BCDC DC-DC In-vehicle charger range into the vehicle's engine bay;Manufactured from durable 304 stainless steel;Ensure a professional and neat install, removing the need to use custom bracket and drilling holes;Guarantee optimal performance by ensuring it gets cool airflow;Multi-stage charging algorithm allows them to charge any commonly used automotive auxiliary battery to 100%;Includes everything needed for a hassle-free installation including comprehensive instructions, fasteners and mounting bracket
node.sales_desc:
The REDARC Mounting Bracket enables installation of the BCDC range into a wide range of vehicles.

These mounting bracket is manufactured from robust 304 stainless steel and is purpose-built to fit the BCDC DC-DC charger into existing mounting points located within a vehicle's engine bay. By using this mounting bracket, you will guarantee a neat and professional installation of your REDARC dual battery charger.

Another advantage of this Mounting Bracket is that it positions the BCDC Charger at the front of the vehicle where it will receive cool airflow which results in optimal performance.

REDARC's wide selection of DC to DC battery chargers are designed to keep your battery charged whilst driving and will fully charge auxiliary batteries to a proven 100%. Compact in size, easy to install and fully sealed - water, dust and vibration are no match for REDARC's vehicle battery chargers. Suitable for 12 or 24-volt vehicle systems, REDARC's dual battery chargers work with either standard, voltage alternators or smart alternators.

node.long_desc: One person operation from the side of the truck;Fully integrated bow system (no loose screws or bolts);Attaches with four clamps (included);No drilling required;Include front bulkhead bar and tailgate bar for secure installation;Made with heavy-duty Black Diamond fabric;Laminated PVC coated sailcloth that is mildew resistant and UV-protected;Removable and replaceable DOT-approved, tinted rear window panel;Removable side window panels which roll into storage pocket;Improved storage with the integrate boot system;Functional third brake light (CHMSL) sewn into the top with wiring harness
node.sales_desc: Based on consumer feedback, Bestop has improved the Supertop for Truck creating the ultimate in flexible storage and coverage for truck beds. The improved design allows for one-person operation and features removable fabric side panels. When not in use, the top can be stored in the convenient built in storage system along with the side panels.

node.long_desc: Easy bolt-on installation;No drilling required;Uses existing mounting holes;Easier access for getting in and out of your vehicle;Made with high-quality, thick steel construction and durable rubber grips
node.sales_desc: Gain easier access for getting in and out of your lifted vehicle with Rough Country's grab handles. These heavy-duty grab handles are incredibly easy to install, and offer an easy way to climb into your cab and a convenient place to hang on when taking to the trails.

node.long_desc: Seat spacers;Grade 8 hardware;Easy bolt-on installation;Improves visibility;Spacers are made from fiberglass reinforced nylon for strength and durability
node.sales_desc: These kits raise your seats, allowing you to see better over the dashboard and improving overall visibility both on and off road!

node.long_desc: Wide center tread blocks;Enhanced stability, handling and even treadwear;Multiple sipes;Good all-terrain traction;New Stone-Ejector-Technology;Help prevent stones from drilling and lodging in the tread;3 ply construction;Increased stability and resistance to punctures
node.sales_desc: The Renegade A/T5 is an all-season, all-terrain tire within the Radar Tires Renegade family. The pinnacle of the all-terrain offerings from Radar Tires, this range has been designed for SUVs and light trucks. The A/T5 features the innovative and unique stone-ejector-technology that prevents stones from drilling and lodging in the tread. It has been test proven against the best competitors in the toughest terrains. This makes it an ideal choice for those who like to venture off-road but need an assured ride on-road as well.

If your stock reverse lights are not cutting it in the dirt or in your daily life, Baja Designs has a solution for you. This kit comes with everything you need for a simple installation that provides a huge upgrade to your stock lighting.

node.display_name: Baja Designs Light Bar Bumper Kits
Oracle Lighting LED ATV Headlight Halo Kits
node.long_desc: Now includes FREE Adhesion Promoter;Direct-to-lens surface mounting;Quick connect wiring adapters;Wide voltage external LED drivers;IP67 waterproof rating;Genuine 3M VHB adhesive backing;Easy install - No cutting /No baking;1-year warranty
node.sales_desc: This new ORACLE Halo Kit features ORACLE SMD Halos that are resin injected resulting in an IP67 waterproof rating. These new SMD Halos are installed directly to the outside of your ATV's headlight lens making installation easy even for a novice! The halo kit is 12V powered and can be wired directly to your 12V outlet or to a multifunction controller to add functions.

node.long_desc: 3/16-inch & 1/4-inch heavy-duty steel construction;CNC laser cut;Precision brake formed;Rattle free design;Bolts directly onto Road Armor Tire Carrier Arm;Hardware NOT Included;Made in the USA
node.sales_desc: Specifically designed to follow, compliment, and accentuate the body lines of your vehicle, you can transform your vehicle to withstand any beating. With additional options to include a tire carrier and countered flares these bumpers and accessories fit any Truck/Jeep enthusiasts style.

node.display_name: American Trail Products Spare Tire Delete Kit
node.long_desc: CNC cut and formed from 1/8 inch 1018 Cold Rolled Steel;Spare tire delete kit;Mount can hold a license plate and rear view camera;Mounting hardware included;Bolt on installation;Made in the USA;Limited lifetime warranty
node.sales_desc: The ATP Jeep JL Wrangler Spare Tire Delete - License plate Camera Mount is manufactured in the USA with functionality in mind while adding some style to the exterior of your Jeep. ATP manufactures in the USA using the best materials and manufacturing processes available, starting with 1/8 1018 cold rolled, laser cut steel, then CNC press forming each part before professionally welding and hand finishing each part. Finally, we apply a heavy powder-coat finish for long lasting protection!. The ATP JL Tailgate Spare Tire Delete - license plate Camera Mount integrates your factory JL rear camera back to its correct location, while eliminating your spare tire and giving your Jeep a cleaner look"

Full package of every kitchen need you have into one incredible, deluxe kit for you to install into your vehicle;Turns cargo space into a 10-1/2 foot spacious kitchen;6 feet of counter-top space for all your kitchen needs;Latches securely lock drawers both open and closed;Attic front and rear open with easy to operate bungee straps;Approximately 160 pounds;24-1/2 W x 31-11/16" H x 37" D (closed)"
node.sales_desc: The Trail Chef Deluxe puts the full package of every kitchen need you have into one incredible, deluxe kit for you to install into your vehicle. The Trail Chef Deluxe turns the cargo space of your truck or SUV into a 10-1/2 foot, spacious kitchen with 6 feet of spacious counter-top for all your kitchen needs! This product comes Deluxe with a built-in collapsible, removable sink, double-burner stove, pantry, attic, water-jug, securing straps, propane tank extension hose, and a slide-out cutting board with silverware drawer. You'd be crazy not to go with the Trail Chef Deluxe if you're itching to have all these features on your Trail Chef. The Trail Chef Deluxe will be all you need for your cooking needs during your next camping trip, overlanding tour, or football tailgate.

node.display_name: Addictive Desert Designs Bomber Front Bumpers
node.long_desc: Modern plate steel design;Full 3/16 aluminum skid plate;Weighs less than the OEM front bumper;Mounts for 3 Baja Designs LP6 round lights or 4 RIGID 360 6" round lights;Retains OEM tow hooks;Fully bolt-on;Made in America"
node.sales_desc:
The Addictive Desert Designs Bomber front bumper for the Ford Raptor is the ultimate combination of form and function. The modern plate steel face of the bumper gives an aggressive styling, while the full 3/16 aluminum skid plate allows the Bomber to be lighter than the OEM bumper.

The Bomber is offered in two varieties: with 4 Rigid 360 6" light mounts or 3 Baja Designs LP6 light mounts in the center. Additional cube light mounts on each side of the bumper give even more lighting options. OEM tow hooks are retained for added utility. As always, this bumper is fully bolt-on and made in America."

node.display_name: Toyo Open Country A/T III Tires
node.long_desc: New tread compound and design;Provides confident wet braking and handling;Provides cut-and-chip resistance;Provides excellent off-road grip;Delivers a quiet and comfortable ride;More evenly distributed void area;Enhances on and off-road traction;Increases tread block rigidity for excellent handling stability;Provides better worn appearance;Staggered shoulder lugs;Enhance off-road traction with biting edges;Increased lateral grooves;Enhance traction on all surfaces, including snow;Reduce irregular wear;Eject stones from grooves
node.sales_desc:
The All-New Open Country A/T III is a revolutionary new all-terrain tire that delivers gripping off-road traction with responsive and predictable on-road handling. With a strong focus on wet performance, durability and treadwear life, Toyo introduces advances in tread design, construction and all-new tread compounding. It also provides a quiet ride with exceptional stability. The Open Country A/T III is built to get there and get back home, regardless of terrain or weather.

Tires make a huge difference in how your vehicle handles off the road. Besides engine, braking and suspension components, tires make the biggest contribution to its performance and safety. But every rider's needs are different. That's why 4 Wheel Parts offers thousands of tire models, including the Toyo Tire Open Country A/T III. We offer everyday low prices on the A/T III and more, making it easy and affordable to equip yourself and your vehicle. And with our fast and efficient shipping, you save both money and time.

A Versatile Tire With Solid Performance
There are lots of things to like about Toyo's Open Country A/T III tire. It's a solid all-terrain tire with a great balance of on- and off-road performance. With its advanced tread design and compound, the Open Country delivers grippy off-road traction, impressive on-road handling and long tread life. Toyo's OC A/T III also offers superior stability and a quiet ride both on and off the pavement.

Ready to bring the Toyo Open Country all-terrain tire home? Shop online and get it delivered right at your home or office. We ship from our six distribution centers across the continental United States. Need your wheels sooner? No worries. Just select our Curbside and Store Pickup service when adding items to your cart.

node.display_name: Vision X Lighting Dura Mini Work Lights
node.long_desc: Four High Output 3-Watt LEDs For 12-Watts Total;2,000 Raw Lumens / 950 Effective Lumens;IP-69K Waterproof / High Pressure Spray;Weatherproof Deutsch Connector;Extended Industrial Warranty;Die-Cast Aluminum Housing;Polycarbonate Lens
node.sales_desc:
Vision X Lighting continues to drive the LED Lighting market with the release of the DURA Mini, a compact universal LED light designed to excel in a variety of applications. The DURA Mini combines durability, affordability, and performance for many on-the-job lighting needs. This 12-Watt fixture consists of four 3-Watt LEDs combined for 2,000 raw lumens and has a 60 Flood beam pattern for optimal spread. The DURA Mini draws a mere 1.0A (12V) allowing it to operate without putting stress on vehicle components.

The 2.75 housing combined with an adjustable single-bolt mounting system and a weatherproof Deutsch connector allows the DURA Mini to excel in endless applications. Whether it is used on a service vehicle, a long-haul trailer, for reverse lighting, or as rock lights on the trail, the DURA Mini is an affordable solution to get the job done.

node.display_name: Vision X Lighting Wiring and Adapters
Vision X Lighting A-Pillar Light Mount Kits
node.long_desc: Bolt on plug-n-play installation; No drill mounting to factory A-pillar location; Durable powder coated steel brackets; Drastically increase visibility and light output
node.sales_desc: Features 25 watt LED Technology, narrow beam pattern offers you an even tighter beam pattern for great distance, and black aluminum housing. Comes with a standard warranty on the hardware and extended on the lights, and multi-volt 9-48V DC input. Offers a bolt on direct to factory mounting and gives you triple the light output of factory.

node.display_name: Vision X Lighting Optimus Series Polycarbonate Light Covers
node.long_desc: Transforms Optimus into 20 lights in 1; Change beam pattern in a snap; Shatterproof polycarbonate
node.sales_desc: The Vision X round light cover features polycarbonate protective cover, offers a shatterproof cover that protects from rock and debris impacts, and comes in multiple housing colors. Comes with a standard warranty, each cover weighs 1 pound. Coming with a new Vision X snap on design locking them down tight to the light.

node.display_name: Vision X Lighting Cannon Polycarbonate Light Covers
node.long_desc: Available in different colors;Transforms cannon into 20 lights in 1; Shatterproof polycarbonate
node.sales_desc: The Vision X Cannon light covers features polycarbonate protective cover, offers a shatterproof cover that protects from rock and debris impacts, and comes in multiple housing colors. Comes with a standard warranty, each cover weighs 1 pound. Coming in with a fully gasketed cover for dust and water protection.

node.display_name: Vision X Lighting Shocker Dual Action LED Light Bars
node.long_desc: Dual function lighting technology; Wide spread amber elliptical beam for dust or fog; Long distance Vector Reflector Technology; Race inspired side wing mounts; Wiring harness with 3-way toggle switch included
node.sales_desc:
The Shocker Dual Action LED Light Bar brings versatility and lighting power to the forefront by allowing you to adjust your lighting to the ever-changing driving conditions with the flick of a switch. Experience the all-new VRT (Vector Reflector Technology) at high speeds by shining a long distance, broad spot beam that fans across the trail.

When dust and fog try to slow you down, engage the Amber PLC (Photon Light Core Technology) to pierce the night by reducing shadows and white-out through the proper Amber LED lighting spectrum and wide-elliptical shaped beam.

node.display_name: Vision X Lighting XPR-S LED Light Bars
node.long_desc: Upgraded IRIS reflector technology with 10 watt CREE LED;Produces an extreme distance spot beam; Dual mounting standard; Includes adjustable mounting feet and end cap wing mounts; Plug and play harness included
node.sales_desc: The Vision X XPR-S has been updated with new IRIS reflector technology to give 40-90% more distance than the XPR series, and features Prime Drive Technology, a Custom beam pattern that offers you great distance with spread to the beam, and black aluminum housing. The XPR-18S comes standard with an extended warranty, and multi-volt 9-32V DC input. This light offers multiple mounting options. Coming with Prime Drive for enhanced reliability & output and our new 10 watt LED's this light has an extraordinary light output.

node.display_name: Vision X Lighting Behind Grille Rack
node.long_desc: Lights not included - shown for illustration;Powder coat black with hardware;Behind the grill light bar mount;Bolt-on plug-n-play installation;Direct fit into factory bumper;Durable powder coat steel brackets;Drastically increase visibility and light output;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Vision X Behind the Grille Light Bar Kit is designed to drastically increase visibility but still maintain that factory look. This complete bolt-on lighting solution mounts directly behind the grille and is positioned to shine a high powered beam far and beyond the roadway. Fits 2014-2016 GMC Sierra 1500, 2014-2016 Chevy Silverado 1500, 2015+ GMC Sierra HD and 2015+ Chevy Silverado HD.

node.long_desc: Each Unita Cargo Bed Rail has a load rating of 500 pounds;Constructed from 6063-T5 extruded aluminum;Features an attractive and durable textured black powder coat finish for corrosion resistance;Textured finish provides more grip to keep Tie-Down Anchors in place;End Caps constructed from UV resistant and flexible injection molded high-density polyurethane (HDPE) plastic;All hardware features black automotive grade coatings;No drilling or tapping required

Secure your toys in the bed of your JT Gladiator pickup with our innovative TeraFlex JT: Unita Cargo Bed Rail System with Tie-Down Anchors. Aluminum rails feature an attractive black powder coat finish for durability. Includes the front rail and two side rails as well as four Uinta Cargo Tie-Down Anchors.

Uinta Cargo Tie-Down Anchors are constructed from a combination of stainless-steel and anodized aluminum for good looks and durability making them much stronger than the plastic alternatives. Compatible with the TeraFlex Uinta Cargo Bed Rail System as well as the Mopar Bed Side Rails.

node.display_name: Rock Krawler RRD Racing Remote Reservoir Shocks
node.long_desc: Hard anodized aluminum fluted shock body;Best cooling emulsion shock in the industry;Lightest weight shock in its class;3/4 Inch Nitrotec Steel shaft;Viton o-ring and double lip Buna N shaft seals;Billet aluminum valve circuit with digressive valving;High quality shock oilMoly piston wear band;Serviceable, rebuild-able, re-valve-able, completely tune able by the factory or the do-it-yourselfer;Remote reservoir with internal floating piston;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The RRD 2.0 Remote Reservoir Shock's fluted aluminum body gives the advantage of weight reduction without sacrificing strength. Which not only make this shock the lightest shock in its class, it also provides a surface area greater than most 2 inch bodied shocks. The fluting provides the structure required to ensure the aluminum cylinders are as strong, if not stronger than their steel 2.0 inch counterparts. The shock bodies are also treated with a military grade hard anodized coating so you never have to worry about corrosion. A high quality DU bearing provides the bearing surface for the massive 3/4 inch Nitrotec Steel shaft. And unlike chrome plated shafts these Nitrotec steel shafts are bare so you never have to worry about pitting or flaking potentially destroying the seals. While a billet aluminum valve circuit with digressive valving controls the dampening, redundant sealing technology keeps the shock oil where is belongs. The shock oil is formulated for fade-free dampening and smooth rebounds. Its high viscosity index and shear stability controls shock fade. This with a custom moly piston wear band greatly reduces shock body wear.All these features combine to make the RRD 2.0 Remote Reservoir Shock a fraction of the weight of the competitions 2.0 steel body counterparts and cool twice as fast for fade resistant performance. And all RRD Shocks come with a 6 month Warranty against defects in materials and workmanship.

These neoprene coil over shock protection covers offer an added layer of resistance keeping dirt, mud, grime, snow, harsh road salts / spray's, and rocks from getting to the shock shafts or seals. This added layer of protection helps prevent damage like shaft pitting & cut seals that require you to have your shocks rebuilt prematurely. ICON Shock Wraps velcro on in seconds, and have a nice form fit with elastic banded ends to give you the most protection possible.
