node.sales_desc: DV8 Off Road truck bumpers are built with abuse in mind. DV8 bumpers are tested and proven in the desert, heavy off road recovery, and utility. DV8 bumpers are made from 3/16 cold rolled steel with 1/4 inch plus gusseting and mounting points. Every DV8 truck bumper comes with DV8's exclusive wrinkled 2 step powder coat. This finish looks great, is extremely durable, and is highly UV resistant. DV8 bumpers are 100 percent bolt on and include DV8's 2 year warranty against manufacturer defects. When you're tired of banging up your trucks thin fragile factory bumpers, DV8 has you covered. All of their front bumpers accommodate a 12,500lb winch, come with 7/8 inch D-ring shackles, and have holes for LED lighting.

node.long_desc: Pair of front or rear fenders available;Front fenders measure 7.5 wide;Rear fenders measure 4.5" wide;Front fenders include a plug and play LED light kit - no cutting or splicing needed for install;Textured black powder coat finish;Constructed of 1.50 OD x .095 wall steel tubing with a .060 thick steel top plate;Made in the USA"
node.sales_desc:
Fabtech's Jeep JL Tube Fenders have been designed to allow the installation of oversized tires for offroad use while providing additional protection to the vehicle. The Tube Fenders directly replace the factory fenders bolting into the same mounting holes for an easy installation.

These rugged Tube Fenders are constructed of 1.50 OD x .095 wall steel tubing with a .060 thick steel top plate. This construction is extremely durable in absorbing side impacts from large objects when driving in tight offroad conditions.

The JL Tube Fenders are a narrow design compared to the factory fender. The front fenders measure 7.5 wide while the rears are 4.5" wide.

The front fenders include a plug and play LED light kit. There is no cutting and splicing of the factory wiring required for installation. The light kit features LED Daytime Running lights, turn signals and side marker lights for Rubicon, Sahara and Moab models. For Sport and Sport S models that do not have factory Daytime Running Lights, the light kit will function as turn signals and marker lights only.

Fabtech Jeep JL Tube Fenders come finished with a textured black powder coat.

These high quality fenders are American made with the proper fit and finish that you have come to expect from Fabtech."

node.long_desc: Offers power, calibration options for tires/gears, and instant throttle improvement all without a PCM swap;Performance in-line tuning module;Throttle sensitivity booster;Calibration tool;Power gains +30 horsepower and +27lb foot torque;Shift on-the-fly tuning levels;4 performance levels;Manage auto start/stop and TPMS;Connects directly to your JL computer system;No flash tuning needed;No additional wiring harness required;Calibrate for aftermarket tires and gears;Adjusts accelerator pedal response;Enjoy added power and funtionality;Not available for sale in CA
node.sales_desc: If you've shopped for performance tuning upgrades for your Wrangler JL, odds are you've come to the realization that tuning" these vehicles is easier said than done. Enter Pulsar! Pulsar is a brand new, innovative product that has been engineered to keep your PCM on the Jeep, with no flash tuning, or removal of the computer itself, required. Pulsar is an in-line computer that connects directly to your vehicle's computer with no additional wiring harness required. Shift on-the-fly directly from your cruised control buttons, calibrate for aftermarket tires, and enjoy added power and functionality. Do we have your attention yet?"

G2 Axle and Gear Air Locking Differential
node.long_desc: Available for upgrading any CORE 44 with 35 spline axles;Pneumatic locker with manual override;35 spline;Forged 8620 Alloy Steel 2-Piece Case;Forged Spider & Side Gears;Pnematics housed in included aluminum G2 Brute diff cover
node.sales_desc:
The G2 CORE locker puts you in control of the flexibility offered by an open differential to a completely locked spool, sending 100% of your available torque to both tires on the axle with the press of a button. When getting back off the trail is going to require all the traction you can muster, G2 offers a manual selector back-up, in case air pressure is lost from the system.

The G2 CORE Locker utilizes the reliability of a shift fork mechanism, coupled to a pneumatic actuator built-into a heavy duty aluminum differential cover for unparalleled reliability and ease of service. The heavy duty locking differential is designed to handle the added stress of large tires and a fully locked differential.

node.sales_desc: In classic style the Road Armor Winch Plate is a no frills cattle pushin front end replacement plate by Road Armor. This modular plate accommodate the factory body lines. node.sales_desc: The Rightline Gear Center Console Trash Bag takes managing garbage inside the vehicle to the next level. The Trash Bag is leakproof with welded seam construction; no additional inner trash bag is necessary. The Center Console Trash Bag is made from the same materials as the company's Roof Top Cargo Bags, so it is built to last. The Bag features a drawstring top to contain ytheir trash and the smells that go along with it. Drink cups, banana peels, napkins, fast food wrappers, and baby wipes are no challenge for the Trash Bag. A quick release buckle strap attaches the Bag to the center console where it is easily accessible from both the front and the rear seats.

node.display_name: Pro Comp 75 Series Trilogy Race Satin Black Alloy Wheels
node.long_desc: The next-generation Pro Comp Beadlock Wheel is here to take on the most extreme terrain imaginable;Wheel Size: 17 inch diameter;Bolt pattern: 5, 6 and 8 Lug Design;Finish: Satin Black or Super Machined;Look no further, Pro Comp is your one-stop Manufacturer for Jeep Wheels and Jeep Rims;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The next-generation Pro Comp Beadlock Wheel is here to take on the most extreme terrain imaginable. Available in satin black or super machined finishes, the new eight-spoke design yields a classic hardcore look. But the Pro Comp Trilogy Race beadlock wheel is way more than just a pretty face. Engineered to be a full 27% stronger than the previous version, it brings race-level performance to the masses. A completely redesigned bead ring is double the thickness of the original and forged from 6061 aircraft-grade aluminum. Fully countersunk Grade 8 bolts stay protected from rocks, impacts and abuse while NORDLOCK washers ensure that the ring hardware stays properly torqued. The new ring also uses a specialized 45-degree diamond knurl pattern while the bead area of the wheel features Pro-Comp's patented Infini-Grip figure eight pattern. Together they form a super team of grip that keeps the bead locked securely in place regardless of air pressure or impacts. Already battle tested in the harsh deserts of the Baja 1000 and the jagged rocks of King of the Hammers, the next-generation Pro Comp Beadlock wheel can be trusted to thrive in the most extreme environments. Air down and conquer with the new Pro Comp Trilogy Race Beadlock wheel.

node.display_name: TeraFlex Axle Bearing Master Install Kits
Trail Gear Fully Built Rock Assault Front Axles
node.sales_desc: You asked for it and we delivered! Trail-Gear is now offering Fully Built Rock Assault Front Axles! Made entirely of brand new parts, these axles feature everything you need hub-to hub, including a precision installed tie rod and drag link! The only additional items you will need to make this kit work are a pair of tires and a vehicle to bolt it on to.This is a fully assembled front axle made entirely of brand new, upgraded components, not refurbished junkyard parts. The Trail-Gear Fully Built Rock Assault Front Axle features your choice of Toyota Rock Assault Axle Housing width, and comes with upgraded 30-Spline Birfields, 30-Spline Chromoly Axle Shafts, our Fully Loaded Six-Shooter Knuckle Kit, Chromoly Spindles, upgraded Brake Rotors and Calipers and a heavy-duty tie rod and drag link, all expertly assembled by our Master Mechanics! Each Fully Built Rock Assault Front Axle will include Trail-Gear's upgraded Trail Safe Seals and Super Metal Knuckle Studs in addition to all other necessary nuts, bolts and seals. Axle options listed below. Save the time, money and hassle of ordering each component separately and building it yourself. We've already taken care of it!Each Fully Built Rock Assault Front Axle Housing is built with a set of Longfield Birfields and Axles at no additional cost!!!Customize each axle to exactly what you need with your choice of: Axle Width Axle Offset Differential Hubs or Flanges Trunnion Bearing upgrade***Note: These fully built axles are bare and only for Leaf Spring applications. No other bracketry should be welded onto assembled axles. If you are interested in purchasing this kit for 3-link or 4-link applications, we can send all components for your assembly. Please contact our Sales staff with any questions.

node.display_name: Rugged Ridge Elite Fast Track Light Bars
node.long_desc: Rugged Ridge's Elite Fast Track Modular Light Bar features a patented designs intended to provide an attractive and desirable option for JK owners that incorporates Rugged Ridge exclusive Elite styling and high- quality materials;Elite Fast Track Modular Light Bars are constructed from high-quality 6061 T6 aluminum for the A-pillar sections and upper crossbar, with steel mounting brackets and Grade 8 hardware for sound structural integrity;A durable textured black powder coat provides protection from corrosion and keeps the light bar looking new for years to come;The Rugged Ridge Elite Fast Track Modular Light Bar is backed by the industry leading five year limited warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rugged Ridge, a leading manufacturer of high-quality Jeep, truck and off-road parts and accessories, announced the expansion of its Elite line of exterior styling accessories with the addition of its Elite Fast Track Modular Light Bar for 2007-2017 Jeep Wrangler JK models. This new Modular Light Bar for Jeep JK features the ability to arrange and configure lights, trail mirrors, camera mounts and accessories in countless arrangements, for ultimate versatility based on any Jeep owner's exact needs. Both the vertical A-pillar sections of the light bar as well as the horizontal top bar are built from sturdy extruded aluminum and feature integrated channels that allow for mounting of various light and accessory brackets that can be reconfigured easily and repeatedly when the need arises. The Elite Fast Track Modular Light Bar works with LED lights regardless of length and makes no compromises in materials, using high-quality 6061 T6 aluminum for the A-pillar sections and upper crossbar, with steel mounting brackets and Grade 8 hardware for sound structural integrity. A durable textured black powder coat provides protection from corrosion and keeps the light bar looking new for years to come. The Rugged Ridge Modular Light Bar is backed by an industry-leading five-year limited warranty.

This GMZ Wheel has a lightweight design that decreases power loss. The True Beadlock Technology (TBT) firmly clamps tire bead to wheel while the Ring Centric Positioning (RCP) beadlock ring gives you quick hassle-free assembly.
Other Features Include:
- Ideal fitments for both trail and staggered sand setups
- Wheel offsets optimized for a wider more stable machine
- Made with heat treated cast aluminum for extra strength
- Replaceable screw-on center cap securely fastens to wheel
- Durable 1200 lbs. load rating

Other Features:
- Staggered fitments for sand setup with centered offsets
- Made with heat treated cast aluminum for extra strength
- Replaceable screw-on center cap securely fastens to wheel
- Durable 1000 lbs. load rating

Other Features:
- Made with heat treated cast aluminum for extra strength
- Flush snap-in center cap matches contours of wheel design
- Durable 1200 lbs. load rating

The Podium Wheel from GMZ has a rugged 8 spoke design that complements the look of modern machines. The Podium has True Beadlock Technology (TBT) that firmly clamps the tire bead to the wheel, while also having Ring Centric Positioning (RCP) beadlock ring for a quick hassle-free assembly.

Other Features:
Ideal off-road fitments decreases track width for a more agile machine

- Durable 1200 lbs. load rating

Wheel Plug (1056002)"

node.display_name: TeraFlex Alpine RT6 Long Arm Suspension Systems
node.long_desc: HD Drag Link Flip Kit with Front Track Bar Drop Bracket and Frame Brace Kit included;Corrects steering geometry, eliminates front end shimmy, and reinforces the frame;Adjustable Alpine IR Long Control Arms and Brackets balance front caster angle and pinion angles;Optimize rear pinion angle and tune anti-squat geometry for proper suspension alignment;Alpine IR Long Control Arms are constructed from durable 42mm x 4mm (upper) or 50mm x 5mm (lower) wall DOM tube;Alpine Long Arm Brackets are gusseted and reinforced for superior strength with reduced NVH compared to other long arm kits;Alpine Long Arm Brackets reposition frame-end control arm mounting points to restore near factory orientation to reduce bushing stress during extreme droop as well as shock load transferred through the Alpine IR Long Control Arms;Delivers true Rogue Trail (RT) performance;Dependable performance with zero worries;Positive, responsive handling with reduced NVH;Innovative IR Bushings provide unrestricted rotation and flex as well as excellent NVH damping;Maintenance-free IR Bushings improve on- and off-road ride quality and performance;HD Forged Adjustable Front and Rear (4+) Track Bars and Rear Track Bar Bracket improve steering response;Centers axles to optimize vehicle roll center, and reduce body roll for unsurpassed handling;Front SpeedBump and rear Progressive Bump Stops provide progressive compression during high-speed suspension movement;Coil spring retainers prevent the springs from unseating during full suspension travel;Full range of movement for off-road flex and articulation;TeraFlex Limited Lifetime Warranty against defects;Requires cutting and welding;Alignment required;Recommend driveshaft modifications such as their High-Angle Rzeppa CV Driveshafts or High-Angle Rzeppa CV Joint Kit (# 1744014);Requires cutting/removal of factory control arm bracketry to install Alpine Long Arm Brackets"
node.sales_desc:
TeraFlex Alpine RT (Rogue Trail) Suspension Systems build on their already capable Alpine CT (Cross-Trail) Suspension Systems. These systems include all their top-of-the-line components.

The granddaddy of all their kits, the TeraFlex 6 Alpine RT6 Long Arm Suspension System is engineered to excel on the highway, off-road, through the desert, or rock crawling! If that sounds impossible, just remember it's a TeraFlex suspension system built on decades of research and development resulting in the ultimate suspension with a lifetime warranty. The Alpine RT6 includes their HD Drag Link Flip Kit with Front Track Bar Drop Bracket & Frame Brace Kit to correct steering geometry, eliminate front end shimmy, and reinforce the frame. The Alpine RT6 is the pinnacle of JK suspension systems!

Their adjustable Alpine IR Long Control Arms balance front caster angle and pinion angles as well as optimize rear pinion angles, anti-squat geometry, and tire position on vehicles with 3-6" lifts. On higher lifts, Alpine Long Arm Brackets reposition frame-end control arm mounting points to restore near factory orientation to reduce bushing stress during extreme droop as well as shock load transferred through the Alpine Long Control Arms.

The HD Forged Adjustable Front and Rear (4"+) Track Bars and Rear Track Bar Bracket improve steering response, center the axles to optimize vehicle roll center, and reduce body roll for unsurpassed handling.

In addition to optimizing suspension geometry, their long and short adjustable Alpine IR Control Arms feature their all-new IR (Independent Rotation) Bushings. These innovative bushings remove bushing bind during full suspension travel whether on the highway or the trail. This results in unrestricted droop as well as a noticeable ride improvement.

This results in improved suspension geometry and relaxed control arm angles for a superior ride quality and performance regardless of terrain. These systems restore"

node.display_name: TeraFlex Alpine RT4 Long Arm Suspension Systems

node.sales_desc:
TeraFlex Alpine RT (Rogue Trail) Suspension Systems build on their already capable Alpine CT (Cross-Trail) Suspension Systems. These systems include all their top-of-the-line components.

The Alpine RT4 Long Arm Suspension System is engineered to excel on the highway, off-road, through the desert, or rock crawling! If that sounds impossible, just remember it's a TeraFlex suspension system built on decades of research and development resulting in the ultimate suspension with a lifetime warranty. Bolt-on Alpine IR Long Control Arms & Brackets, Alpine IR Front Track Bar, and Front and Rear Track Bar Brackets allow full suspension adjustability, while the SpeedBumps smooth out the unexpected trail bumps.

The adjustable Alpine IR Long Control Arms balance front caster angle and pinion angles as well as optimize rear pinion angles, anti-squat geometry, and tire position on vehicles with 3-6 lifts. On higher lifts, Alpine Long Arm Brackets reposition frame-end control arm mounting points to restore near factory orientation to reduce bushing stress during extreme droop as well as shock load transferred through the Alpine IR Long Control Arms.

The adjustable Alpine IR Front Track Bar and Front (3.5"+) and Rear Track Bar Brackets improve steering response, center the axles to optimize vehicle roll center, and reduce body roll for unsurpassed handling.

In addition to optimizing suspension geometry, adjustable Alpine IR Long Control Arms feature the all-new IR (Independent Rotation) Bushings. These innovative bushings remove bushing bind during full suspension travel whether on the highway or the trail. This results in unrestricted droop as well as a noticeable ride improvement.

This results in improved suspension geometry and relaxed control arm angles for a superior ride quality and performance regardless of terrain. These systems restore front and rear roll axis angles to minimize brake dive and acceleration squat. IR Bushings red"

The full seal weather stripping helps prevent elements from getting into the truck box and the self-adjusting strikers are guided to their latch every time to provide a secure closure. The self-rising gas springs allow easy single handed entry to the box. This box is backed by a 1 year limited warranty.

node.display_name: PIAA Lighting G3 LED Light Bulbs
node.long_desc: Plug and play design;Up to 50% more light output ;Wider viewing angle;Built in Pulse Modulation Control;G3 bulbs are outfitted with factory bulb connections making installation quick and easy;5-year warranty;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: A huge upgrade to the G3's is the addition of the CREE XP-L chips. These new chips provide up to 50% more light output than previous models along with a wider viewing angle. The improved viewing angle effectively fills the light housings creating a sharp beam pattern with amplified coverage and distance with no dead spots. The LED drivers that come with the G3's have built in Pulse Modulation Control. This new feature eliminates the annoying flickering sensation in most vehicles when lower voltage is used in daytime running light mode. The main column on the G3 LED bulbs have been thinned down to place the LED chips closer to the location of a filament in a halogen bulb. This innovative design lets the G3 bulbs perfectly utilizes factory housings much more effectively which produces a seamless beam pattern with no dead spots or light scatter. The cooler LED chips are the longer they will work at maximum light output. The redesigned fan on the G3 LED creates a vacuum effect which delivers 70% more airflow than the previous design. The computer designed fins are placed in an exact location on the fan to keep the LEDs running cool and at optimal light output. Also, this new design cuts resonating fan noise by 40% to eliminate that irritating hum that other name brand bulbs have. The G3's are a plug and play LED bulb. Meaning they will fit perfectly into factory light sockets with no splicing, cutting, or soldering needed. All the G3 bulbs are outfitted with factory bulb connections making installation and quick and easy as possible. Engineered with PIAA's strict Japanese tolerance and manufacturing processes, the G3 LED bulbs with last longer than you probably will own the vehicle. PIAA are so confident that these are the finest made LED bulbs, they offer a 5-year warranty for peace of mind. Note: Does not comply with FMVSS108 or CMVSS108.

node.display_name: Rigid Industries Radiance Plus Curved LED Light Bars
node.long_desc: Improved LED technology;More light output than ever;Consumes a fraction of the power compared to incandescent lighting;High-grade aluminum alloy housing;Offered in: 20, 30, 40, 50 and 54 inch;White, Blue, Red, Green and Amber color options;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The RIGID Radiance Curve Plus light bar is the perfect solution for those who want RIGID's legendary quality at a level everyone can attain. Featuring improved LED technology, the Radiance Plus offers more light output than ever before while consuming a fraction of the power compared to incandescent lighting. The RIGID Radiance Plus is built with the same high-grade aluminum alloy housing as our legendary E-Series, but that's where the visual similarities end. Inside, the Radiance light bar is feature packed, with a black exposed printed circuit board, optimized forward projecting Broad Spot optics which combine the attributes of a spot and flood beam pattern, and recent updates in LED technology that boast up 4,752 raw lumens in the 10 size. Further, the Radiance has back-lighting available in white, amber, red, blue and green. The RIGID Radiance light bar is for the customer who wants a truly custom look that only RIGID can provide. Even better, the Radiance Plus now includes a Multi-Trigger Harness designed specifically for the Radiance light bar. The Radiance Multi-Trigger Harness also comes standard with two separate backlit LED rocker switches (red and blue), so each circuit can be used independently. Radiance Plus Light Bars are available in 20" - 54" lengths."

node.long_desc: UHMW (ultra-high-molecular-weight polyethylene) to provide the ultimate protection for rock crawling;Manufactured from 3/16-inch cold rolled steel with two-stage textured matte black finish;Powdercoat finish - 5 year limited warranty;Smittybilt limited lifetime warranty;Lower design winch plate allows greater air flow and rated to accommodate up to 12k winch;1.75 diameter .120 wall overrider and kickers;O.E. fog light provision and towable D-ring mounts;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The XRC Gen2 Max Front Stubby Bumper has a high degree approach angle and raised corners to maximize ground clearance. The bumper is manufactured from 3/16 cold rolled steel and then robotically welded to the exact specifications. The solid D-ring mounts are welded on the inside and outside (D-rings sold separately). Welds are ground down and smoothed out, then a two stage textured matte black powder coat is applied for the ultimate look. The front stinger is 1.75 tubing and has light tabs that can hold up to two 9 lights (lights sold separately). The bumper is winch ready and can carry winches up to a 10,000 lb. rating. The Gen2 Front Bumper comes with fog light cutouts."

node.long_desc: UHMW (ultra-high-molecular-weight polyethylene) to provide the ultimate protection for rock crawling;Manufactured from 3/16-inch cold rolled steel with two-stage textured matte black finish;Powdercoat finish - 5 year limited warranty;Smittybilt limited lifetime warranty;LED lights included;Modular design tire carrier can be added (sold separately);Fender-to-fender protection;Aux back up light cut out provided;Class III hitch for true towing with towable D-ring mounts;Anti-rattle provision provided for receiver hitch;Works with XRC GEN2 tire carrier (#76857);California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: With an updated look that is sure to be a hit with Jeep owners, the next generation XRC Gen2 rear bumper was designed to meet the needs of off-road enthusiasts. The new bumper features raised corners that allow greater approach and departure angles - perfect for vehicles running over sized tires. The redesigned solid D-ring mounts feature an integrated recovery point. The modular nature of the bumper allows you to add a tire carrier to the bumper (sold separately) S/B76857.

The FOX Performance Series Adjustable Through Shaft (ATS) steering stabilizer offers unrivaled steering control and a striking high tech appearance. The technologically advanced design cancels unwanted steering forces in both directions, taking the place of two conventional opposing stabilizers. It will also respond to your input with 24 clicks of external adjustment to fine tune the feel.The integrated reservoir allows for additional fluid capacity and improves cooling during extreme use. Also included is FOX's relocating hardware that moves the steering stabilizer up and out of the way utilizing a new track bar relocation bolt and 1-3/8 tie-rod mounting clamp. An optional 1-5/8" mounting clamp is available for larger aftermarket tie-rods. The ATS represents a revolutionary breakthrough in stabilizer design.The 2.0 Performance Series IFP steering stabilizer helps take the load off your steering components and keep your tires tracking straight and true. Oversized off-road tires have a tendency to seek out traction in any direction. The large knobs and open tread pattern can cause your front end to wander on or off the road.The 2.0 Performance Series IFP stabilizer uses the same advanced damping technology contained in our Performance Series shocks to tame steering feedback from even the most aggressive tires."

node.long_desc: 2.0 Smooth bore and honed seamless alloy bodies;Thick silver powder coat;Internal IFP mono-tube reservoir design separates shock oil from the high-pressure nitrogen;5/8" hard chrome plated heat-treated alloy steel;JM92 Advanced Suspension Fluid for improved performance at variable temperatures;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The 2.0 Adventure Series IFP smooth body shocks give you increased ride quality and the control you need when heading into the unknown. They use our proven damping technology to provide a comfortable on-road ride and predictable off-road handling in a variety of conditions.The large 5/8 inch alloy steel shock shaft adds increased strength and rigidity. The shafts are hard chrome plated and heat-treated to resist pitting and scratches that can damage shaft seals. Our Internal Floating Piston (IFP) separates the shock oil from the high-pressure, nitrogen charged gas chamber. The IFP eliminates oil aeration allowing maximum performance from the factory-tuned precision valving.Our bolt on, 2.0 Adventure Series IFP shocks provide increased damping in any terrain. Where will your adventure take you?

node.display_name: FOX 2.0 Factory Race Series IFP Bump Stops
node.long_desc: Threaded, impact extruded, black anodized, CNC machined 6061-T6 billet aluminum;Black anodized, CNC machined 6061-T6 billet aluminum;Replaceable Delrin strike pad;Hard chrome plated 1-1/4 4130 steel with Internal Floating Piston (IFP) for increased damping performance;Heavy-duty powdered steel;Tunable, velocity sensitive deburred valve shims;Redundant sealing pack system, main seal, wiper seal, scraper seal;JM92 Advanced Suspension Fluid for improved performance at variable temperatures;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Inspired by it's off-road racing predecessors, the new Factory Series bump stop combines race proven technology with new, cutting-edge features to provide increased damping performance and bottom out control in the last few inches of suspension travel.The threaded body allows you to adjust the mounting height to fine-tune when the bump stop engages during up travel, preventing harsh bottom outs. An Internal Floating Piston (IFP) in the shaft separates the oil and nitrogen to prevent cavitation and bucking while the negative coil spring softens initial impacts and harsh top outs. The integrated FOX AIR VALVE (FAV) is located at the bottom of the shaft for easy access and is protected by the replaceable strike pad.Factory Series bump stops allow you to use every inch of suspension travel without harsh bottoming.

node.display_name: FOX 2.0 Factory Race Series Bump Stops

node.sales_desc: Off-road Factory Race Series bump stops were developed with top off-road racing teams to provide precise control of the last few inches of suspension travel. By applying our race-proven damping technology in a purpose-built, stand-alone component, you can use every bit of suspension travel without harsh bottoming.The built-in FOX Air Valve (FAV) Valve allows precise nitrogen charge adjustments to provide a wide range of bottoming control. The durable construction and replaceable Delrin strike pad are built to take the abuse while providing predictable and quiet operation.

node.long_desc: Creates a cradle for safely using Hi-Lift jacks;Compact size;Stores easily in recovery bag;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The JakJaw creates a much wider and deeper cradle to provide a safer way to join jack and vehicle. Not only does the JakJaw create a safer working environment on the trail, but it also relocates the jack further away from the body of the vehicle preventing damage to sheet metal, fenders and body cladding. Made in the USA, engineered from heavy duty laser cut steel and able to withstand more force than your jack. You will be much safer than ever before. The JakJaw is completely machined formed for precision, it creates a tight fit and with it's compact size it fits naturally into your nearest recovery bag.

AO coolers has been building soft coolers for over 25 years. We've now taken our knowledge to make the best 80 Quart hard sided cooler we are excited to introduce The Everest Series! Built tough to handle the abuse of the great outdoors. Keeping your food, drinks or catch ice cold for days. Rotomolded polyethylene construction, the same process to make whitewater kayaks, ensures excellent impact resistance and long-lasting durability. The Everest Series features a screw-in gasketed 1 dia drain plug a quick twist drains it all. Extra thick 3" walls giving the cooler outstanding resistance to outside temperatures. Foam padded handles are designed to make carrying a loaded cooler easier on the hands for two people. The Everest Series also features one divider to help separate contents of your cooler. High quality coolers at a reasonable price. Our Everest series rotomolded cooler is as tough as the mountain. Dims: 33" x 18" x 19" Wt: 35lbs."

node.sales_desc: This B&M shifter stick assembly is designed specifically for all 2007-Current Jeep Wrangler JK models with 6 speed manual transmissions and can be used as either a direct-replacement of the factory shifter stick, or as the finishing touch when used with B&M's JK Precision SportShifter part #45195. This stick is constructed from high strength 4340 nickel-chromoly steel and features improved bends that provide more shifting leverage and comfort than the factory stick. The stock Jeep shift handle has a thick and soft rubber isolator between the shifter and the stick that reduces transmission noise inside of the Jeep, but degrades over time and results in a very mushy feel. B&M's precision stick features a billet aluminum block with four replaceable rubber o-rings that provide isolation from transmission gear noise and also result in shorter, noticeably firmer and more positive shifts. The shift handle is finished off with a durable black e-coat and topped with a black round B&M logo engraved shift knob showing that you take off-road performance seriously. The stick features a 3/8 x 16 thread pattern so you can also customize the look of your shifter with other styles and colors of shift knobs."

node.sales_desc: The Clubman race seat is a great lightweight, entry level race seat. This seat features extra high kidney bolsters to give you that true bucket seat look and feel. What also makes this seat different is it's more reclined than most fixed back seats. For many, this extra recline makes it much more comfortable. As a rule of thumb, the Clubman will fit up to 36 inch waist. High wear patches are strategically placed to protect your seat from abuse in the high wear areas. The Clubman race seat is available in cloth and vinyl materials."

node.long_desc: Baja XRS Seats;Fits 1976 to 1995 YJ Wrangler and CJ;Direct bolt-in;Powder coated steel frame;Full body support;3, 4 or 5 point harness capability;Sold as a pair;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Baja XRS Suspension Seat is one of the most anticipated seats ever to be offered to the Jeep, Truck, and Off-Road community. You probably saw our advertising campaign asking enthusiasts to help us come up with the ultimate reclining suspension seat. When you combine our years of expertise in aftermarket seating with thousands of designs from enthusiast across the country, you come up with what is hands down the best reclining suspension seat on the market. Most reclining suspension seats look the same, with the XRS we have added a little style and practicality. The Baja XRS combines injection molded memory foam with our suspension technology. Most suspension seats use a low quality cut foam, which over a short period of time will soften and wear to the point that your back and legs will pay the price. The Baja XRS on the other hand uses injection molded memory foam, which combined with our suspension technology, will provide unmatched comfort and support for years to come. The Baja XRS Suspension Seat is a direct bolt-in to CJ and YJ Jeeps and will fit in any other vehicle with Corbeau custom brackets. The Baja XRS will fit up to a 42 inch waist, while still comfortably fitting smaller drivers. The Baja XRS is available in all black vinyl or a black vinyl/cloth combo. Due to seat width the seat cannot recline all the way back when installed in Jeep. The seat will hit the roll bar if reclined all the way back.

node.sales_desc: When it comes to performance exhaust systems, most people are looking for three things: power, sound, and quality. JBA Exhaust Systems deliver the best of all three, giving it both great looks and performance. One of the first performance upgrades typically made to a vehicle is the addition of a performance exhaust system. While there is a high demand for performance sound, the capacity for power in a JBA exhaust system gives JBA the extra edge. Each system is tuned to provide the best possible exhaust tone without being overwhelming from within the vehicle. By replacing the restrictive factory exhaust system with free flowing mandrel-bent stainless tubing and quality performance mufflers, JBA has developed the power, sound, and efficiency desired in a vehicle.

WeatherTech Seat Protectors are the perfect accessory for those vehicle owners needing an extra step of protection for their rear vehicle seating. A much needed accessory for the family road trip warriors" or pet "car ride" companions to prevent scratches, damage or spills from ruining the seat surface.

The Seat Protectors are made from a polycotton drill fabric that features a durable water-repellent finish that'll combat any juice box spill, cereal crumbs or pet mess! It's also engineered with an extra layer of nylon lining, which helps to further protect the covered seat. The Seat Protector stays in place with the help of durable straps, specialty inserts and a non-slip bottom. Semicustom to fit the size and type of vehicle. Quick and easy installation, as well as easily removable for cleaning. The Seat Protector is machine washable, making it an easy accessory for any family."

node.sales_desc: The Superwinch Husky Series - We dare you to find tougher winches. With their rugged worm-gear drive mechanism and 4.2 horsepower series wound motors, the Husky 8 and Husky 10 are two off-road champions in their own right. The case-hardened nickel spur gears and steel-centered phosphor bronze wormwheel matched to a case-hardened ground and polished worm shaft make this winch virtually indestructible. When only the best will do -- the only choice is a Superwinch Husky.

Superwinch S Series winches are powerful series wound motors ranging from 1.1 to 2.0 hp;All steel differential planetary gear sets with gear ratios as high as 253:1;Providing durable and reliable power up to 9000Lbs for all your needs;The electric winch is backed up by power IN and OUT, freespooling drum, mechanical and dynamic braking, and roller fairlead;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The NEW S Series, the most popular performance trailer winch on the market. Already race-proven, S Series winches now have more powerful motors, an integrated sealed switching solenoid, and rugged new handheld remote. Other standard features include power IN and OUT, freespooling drum, mechanical and dynamic braking, and roller fairlead. The fully enclosed housing helps keep the weather out. No wonder they call these winches The Racer's Choice!"

node.sales_desc: The TALON Performance Series is a game changer and has the potential to alter the outcome of the global winch industry. AKA, The Winch of Prey, designed and engineered by Superwinch. This is the industry's best truly sealed vehicle recovery winch assembly. All seals on the entire winch meet the IP67 standard, from the outermost end of the high performance motor and groundbreaking solenoid to the 2-stage planetary and 2-stage spur gearbox.

node.long_desc: The Superwinch LP Series winches are designed to outperform other cheap electric winch models;Making it easy on entry-level buyers shopping for excellent value;Meeting the rugged demands of off-road and utility use;Canks with quality, power, and performance advantages of the Superwinch brand;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Ahead of its time, the Superwinch LP defined what an affordable winch could be. Now the standard for entry level, this winch still stands above others thanks to continuous improvement and refinement.

node.long_desc: An electric winch that is the best chocie for any outdoorsman that needs a versatile winch from Superwinch needing a larger more duarable winch with reliability and functionality;Winch possesses a rugged 3-stage planetary gear train with a 3000 Lb pull rating with a 1.2Hp low-amp permanent magnet draw engine protected by a circut breaker; Compact and quiet this is an all-purpose winch from Superwinch;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: A buyer's best choice for compact, quiet, all-purpose winching; the versatile LT Series winches from Superwinch is ideal for those needing a smaller, durable tool with brand-name reliability and function. Constructed with a low amp, permanent magnet motor protected by a circuit breaker, the LT Series delivers the reliable performance that has made Superwinch the brand users recognize and trust.

node.long_desc: Rubber handheld remote with 12' cord for safety in use;1.2 hp (0.9 kw) PM motor, with a 3,000 LB pull rating, 40' of 3/16 wire rope with the ability to power load in and out;Full metal differential planetary gear train, with pull and turn freespooling clutch, gear ratio of 153:1 and dynamic braking;Weather-sealed solenoid and circuit breaker protection;Removable clevis pinned with latched hook with rope thimble and standard 4-way roller fairlead that attaches to included mounting plate;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Complete with heavy duty 4-way roller fairlead, 12' handheld rubberized remote and 3,000 lbs of rated capacity, the UT 3000 is a great choice for utility pulling. The sealed solenoid keeps winch switching from the elements while the simple pull and turn freespool knob insures secure gear engagement. Comes with fairlead mount plate and circuit breakers for safety.
The Superwinch UT3000 is a lightweight utility winch that can be used as either a portable tool or can be permanently mounted using the included two-bolt pattern mounting plate. Its efficient low draw 1.2 hp PM motor easily attaches to, and is powered by, your car battery or an auxiliary 12-volt battery if used away from your vehicle. The motor features a 3,000 LB line pull rating, circuit breaker protection, both load in and load out drum rotation for mechanized movement of winch rope, a full metal differential planetary gear box and an accessible pull and turn freespooling clutch allowing users to quickly disengage the motor and manually draw out as much winch rope as needed, at any time. In addition, as safety is an important consideration with any piece of machinery, the Superwinch UT3000 winch features a wealth of valuable safety features. These include bi-directional dynamic braking to minimize the possibility of winch rope slippage in the event of power failure or surge and to provide quick stopping of the drum, a weather sealed solenoid to ensure safe, reliable, electromagnetic power in all weather conditions and a rubberized remote switch with a 12-foot extension cable, allowing for safe distances between the user and winch in all situations.

node.long_desc: Jeep winches made in the USA by Superwinch;Compact and stylish;A rugged gearbox and simple direct motor-mounted switching mechanism;Differential planetary gearing and a dynamic breaking action;Superwinch X Series is ready to be your pulling partner;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Superwinch X-Series, the winch that started it all. Compact and stylish, the X line is as popular today as ever. A rugged gearbox and simple direct motor-mounted switching mechanism make these winches an economical and reliable choice.

node.long_desc: Premium performance - Bargain price!;Power, reliability and durability - that's what the Superwinch Terra is all about;Built in 3 capacities (2,500, 3,500 and 4,500); Choose either synthetic rope or steel cable;There's a Terra winch that's right for you;2X bigger gears;Reinforced drums;Clockable for best fit;Better motors;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: All Terra winches come standard with a steel drum specifically designed to withstand the rigors of synthetic rope (a Superwinch Exclusive) and are available with either galvanized wire rope with a 4-way roller fairlead or Blue AmSteel Dyneema SK-75 synthetic rope (yellow in color and rated at 7,700 lbs the competition's synthetic rope is only rated at 4,000 lbs at best) and attached to a heavy-duty clevis pinned latched hook. The synthetic rope models include a blue anodized aluminum hawse engraved with the Superwinch logo.

node.long_desc: VOLANT RECHARGER KIT: Air flow test have proven that cotton-gauze filters flow much more air than paper element filters do. However, when they get dirty, they can clog up and limit air flow. This is one reason why you should clean your air filter with Volant's filter cleaner kit. The kit contains Volant's filter cleaner that loosens and removes dirt trapping capabilities. Volant's filter oil contains a blue dye to easily see where the oil has saturated into the filter, eliminating the common mistake of over oiling the filter. When used correctly, Volant's filter cleaner kit can maintain the life and performance of your Volant high-flow filter and Cool Flow air intake system.;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: VOLANT RECHARGER KIT: Air flow test have proven that cotton-gauze filters flow much more air than paper element filters do. The kit contains Volant's filter cleaner that loosens and removes dirt trapping capabilities. Volant's filter oil contains a blue dye to easily see where the oil has saturated into the filter, eliminating the common mistake of over oiling the filter. node.sales_desc: Westin Wade Sure Fit Cargo Mats offer the protection you need to keep your factory carpets looking great season after season. They're molded from a rubberized co-polymer that provides maximum durability and flexibility, for years of reliable performance. Plus, they're easy to clean - simply remove the liners from your vehicle and hose them off. Each set of Wade Sure-Fit Cargo Mats are custom-molded to your year, make, and model vehicle. Westin Automotive uses a digitally-engineered design process to ensure a perfect fit over every contour of your vehicle's floor, as well as complete and total carpet protection. These cargo mats feature a textured, non-slip surface for sure footing, and a unique grooved surface to direct water, mud, and spilled drinks away from the carpet and your feet. Westin Wade Sure Fit Cargo Liners are made to work with carpeted floors will not work with vinyl floor. Keep your carpet looking showroom-new even in the face of accidental spills with Westin Wade Sure Fit Cargo Mats.

node.sales_desc:
Keep your carpet looking showroom-new even in the face of muddy boots and coffee spills with Wade Sure-Fit Custom Floor Mats by Westin Automtive.

Wade Sure-Fit Floor Mats offer the complete protection you need to keep your factory carpets looking great season after season. Molded from a rubberized co-polymer that provides maximum durability and flexibility they offer reliable performance year after year. Plus, they're easy to clean - simply remove the liners from your vehicle and hose them off. Each set of Wade Sure-Fit Floor Liners is custom-molded to your year, make, and model vehicle. Wade Automotive uses a digitally-engineered design process to ensure a perfect fit over every contour of your vehicle's floor, as well as complete and total carpet protection. These floor liners feature a textured, non-slip surface for sure footing, and a unique grooved surface to direct water, mud, and spilled drinks away from the carpet and your feet.

Sure-fit mats are made to work with carpeted floors will not work with vinyl floor.

node.sales_desc: This 13' wiring harness is designed to connect a single 40 inch-50 inch LED light bar to your 12V electrical system. It features battery terminals on one end and a Deutsch connector on the other to connect to the light. It incorporates an inline fuse holder, a 12V relay, and a waterproof switch. This harness is compatible with the following Rigid Industries LED Lights: 50 inch E-Series, 50 inch SR-Series.

node.long_desc: Length: 24 inch long from end to end;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Inline Switch Kit: Use this kit to install a switch inline anywhere between your power source and Rigid Light! Ultra-durable, waterproof, dustproof and impact resistant. LED on/off indicator light. Kit includes switch, VHB mounting tape and radius mount pad for bar mounting.

node.display_name: Rigid Industries D-Series Fog Light Mounting Kits
node.long_desc: Stainless Steel Construction;Black Powder Coat Finish;Includes All Necessary Hardware;Limited Lifetime Warranty;Made in the USA;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rigid Industries has found a way to fit a square peg in a round hole. Our 2006-2014 Ford F-150 Fog Light Replacement Kit allows you to mount our D-Series (Dually or D2) LED lights (not included) in your Ford's OEM fog lamp locations. This kit gives your otherwise square D-Series lights a clean from-the-factory look without having to drill or cut into your bumper. Made from high quality stainless steel, these adaptor plates are powder-coated black for a long-lasting finish. This kit comes with everything you need to install D-Series lights in both fog light locations and is backed by Rigid Industries' limited lifetime warranty.

node.long_desc: Universal fit;Pair of lights;H4 bulbs;Impact resistant body;200,000 candlepower;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The SDB-210HB uses a precision design Free Curve reflector that is outstandingly smooth and heat resistant. It reflects light efficiently due to the vaporized aluminum applied to the reflector surface. Aggressive off-road drivers will appreciate a lamp with a spot beam able to illuminate approximately 270 meters ahead, with a concentrated lighting pattern and a driving beam wide enough to supplement vehicle headlights by illuminating the entire surface in front of the vehicle. Hard off-road driving generates vibration and shock. The SDB-210HB has an internal light frame to protect the lamp and a stone guard to protect the lens. The body is constructed of a polycarbonate resin which has excellent impact resistance. Serious off-roaders usually run in serious weather. The SDB-210HB has weather resistant rubber seal to help protect the lamp integrity. The hardened glass lens gives excellent heat and thermal shock resistance, strength and translucency. The lamp illumination angle can be adjusted to 15 degrees up or down to fine-tune the light pattern. Dual beam control switch includes relay control feature and LED illumination when lamps are in use.

node.long_desc: Stainless Steel Window Trim;No Cutting Or Drilling;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Putco's Window Trim Accents are custom designed to precisely fit your vehicle. Simple and easy installation with 3M tape.

node.long_desc: Warn 12-S Electric winch is equipped with Warn Spydra Pro synthetic rope and a drum and fairlead designed for synthetic winch rope; Warn winch has a line pull range of 12000LBs; This wrangler winch features a weatherproof industrial contactor and heavy duty remote control;Spydura Pro synthetic rope features improved strength and ease of handling over conventional wire rope; Designed to meet CE standards;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The Series 12-S winch is equipped with Warn Spydura Pro synthetic rope and a drum and fairlead designed specifically for synthetic winch rope. Spydura Pro synthetic rope features improved strength and ease of handling over conventional wire rope. Spydura Pro fibers are heat treated under tension, ensuring a higher breaking strength and greater load bearing capacity at equal diameters. The winch also features a weatherproof industrial contactor and heavy duty remote control. The disc brake is designed to hold full rated load and the motor is protected by a thermal over-load switch. Designed to meet CE standards. Remote Control Assembly-10m, Synthetic Rope, and Hawse Fairlead included.

node.long_desc: Universal fit;Pair of lights;H4 bulbs;Impact resistant body;100,000 candlepower;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: The SDB-160HB uses a free curve reflector. A Free Curve reflector is very efficient because it uses the whole reflector. This allows the spot beam to illuminate approximately 235 meters ahead and the driving beam to illuminate the entire surface in front of the vehicle.

node.sales_desc: The high quality lamp construction is the same as in the SDB-160HB. The differences lie in the bulb wattage and the beam patterns that conform to the European Community standards (ECE Approval#9764). The results is a wider fog beam pattern with sharp light cut-offs closer to the vehicle and narrower, shorter spot beam pattern than the SDB-160HB. node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust 94000 Series Dual Sensor OBDII Compliant Universal Catalytic Converter
node.long_desc: These days, the DIY, or do-it-yourself crowd is all about creating custom work and one-off exhausts are no exception. Whether you're working on a classic car, race car or just your daily driver, a MagnaFlow universal converter should be the standard building block for your custom exhaust. Each converter is built to last with its ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, as well as a stainless steel body and heat shield that contain a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Another great characteristic of MagnaFlow's universal converters is that each part number covers a wide range of applications so one converter will work on a variety of makes and models. Since these items are universal, some modifications may be involved such as cutting or welding.;California Residents: WARNING"

Whether you're working on a classic car, race car or just your daily driver, a MagnaFlow universal converter should be the standard building block for your custom exhaust. Each converter is built to last with its ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, as well as a stainless steel body and heat shield that contain a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Another great characteristic of MagnaFlow's universal converters is that each part number covers a wide range of applications so one converter will work on a variety of makes and models. Since these items are universal, some modifications may be involved such as cutting or welding.

node.long_desc: Stage 8 Locking Systems offers the opportunity to restore the dependability of Dana 44 and Dana 60 front assemblies with these Stage 8 X-Lock locking spindle nuts. These patented locking spindle nuts are guaranteed to never loosen, even under the most extreme conditions. The X-Locks were developed for the rugged life of competitive off-road vehicles. Any vehicle with Dana 44 and Dana 60 front assemblies can be retrofitted with the X-Locks for dependable, long service life and save thousands in repair dollars. Stage 8 X-Locks are laser-cut from 4130 steel and can be easily installed without any special tools. X-Locks are heat-treated and through-hardened and will maintain bearing preload value. They can be easily locked within 1/2 degree of any position.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: Dana Spicer Dana 60 5.38 Ratio Ring and Pinions
node.long_desc: All Dana Spicer ring gear and pinion sets are designed and tested to meet original equipment specifications;Spicer gearing is manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated to precision, so you can count on optimum set-up and mating of the gears;Dana Spicer has conducted aggressive dynamometer tests to ensure exceptional performance of all of their genuine Spicer gearing;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
Dana Spicer ring and pinions are the same high-quality gears that originally came in your Dana axle from the factory They're available in the most popular performance and replacement ratios. The ring and pinion gears are painstakingly designed and tested just like the original, which means smooth, reliable performance. They're built to the latest high-tolerance specifications, while also featuring a premium heat treating process that improves strength and durability. Optimal tooth profiles are also employed, which keeps operation both smooth and quiet.

When you purchase genuine Spicer ring and pinion gear sets, you can be confident the ring and pinion set will meet or exceed the exact Dana standards that original equipment manufacturers have relied upon for more than a hundred years.

The ring and pinions are manufactured with a special grade of steel, machined and heat-treated, so you can count on properly matched sets for optimal set-up and mesh.

Remember: Non-genuine replacement parts are usually not manufactured to the same standards, which can cost you more in the long run. When you purchase gearing with the Spicer name, you can rest assured that you are getting quality product that's engineered to keep your vehicle on the road. Reduce your downtime and cost with genuine Spicer OE products.

node.display_name: Dana Spicer Ultimate Dana 60 Axle Assemblies
node.long_desc: The strongest, most robust axle assembly on the market;Massive Spicer SPL 70 u-jointsexclusive to Dana;Provides optimal performance for lifted vehicles with larger tires;Improved rock solid seals for optimal protection from environmental contamination;Manufactured from cold-forged steel;Spicer 35 spline SAE-4340 nickel chromoly steel axle shafts;Warn 35 spline hub locks;Allowing for wheel bearings to be serviced individually;Easier to repair and service than unit bearing design;High-strength, heavy gauge brackets;Cover face rotated back for greater ground clearance;Reinforced ribbing on bottom of carrier to prevent hang-ups on rocks or rough terrain;Selectable electronic locking differentials;Precision-forged gears offer ideal meshing, strength and durability;Upper and lower control arms in same location as OE;Better fit, less adjustment on control arm;Genuine Made in the USA Spicer 10" (256 mm) ring and pinion gear;Precision heat treated for optimal hardness and durability;Face hobbed for precise mating of gear teeth and a quieter ride;Lapped to reduce noise and heat;Spicer 1350 Strap-style/Half-round end yoke;Axle tubes: 3.5" tube diameter/.370" wall thickness;Helps prevent steering from being knocked out of alignment;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc:
When you've reached the point where only the best will do, look no further than Dana Spicer's Ultimate 60 front axle assembly. It's the strongest, most robust axle assembly on the market today, with features and upgrades that exceeed anything currently available for your JK. If you subscribe to the notion of do things right the first time", then this is the ultimate axle assembly for the most ardent off-road JK enthusiast.

Added Features for the Jeep JK. Added Confidence Off-Road. Jeep Wrangler JK owners are some of the most hardcore off-roaders out there, and Dana axles have been right there with them. So when these Jeep owners modify their axles for even better performance over rocks, across sand and through mud, Dana took notice. The Ultimate Dana 60 incorporates many of these innovations, so you can get premium performance right from the start.

The Ultimate Dana 60 features massive Spicer SPL 70 universal joints, delivering optimal performance for lifted vehicles with larger tires. You not only get a higher torque load, but with new rock solid" seals you get peak protection from environmental contaminants. In addition, Spicer 35 spline SAE-4340 nickel chromoly steel axle shafts help meet the rigors of off-road, providing maximum strength and durability for vehicles with larger tires.

And that is just the beginning. Ultimate Dana 60 front and rear axles feature improvements throughout that are designed to give you an advantage across even the most brutal terrain. Check out the brochure on the left, and learn about everything from genuine Made in the USA Spicer 10 inch ring and pinion gearing to the built-in nodular iron diff cover with a raised fill plug for increased fluid capacity. Then get in touch with your Spicer parts representative today to find out how you can benefit from the Ultimate Dana 60 axle."

node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust 95500 Series Large Oval OBDII Compliant Universal Catalytic Converter
node.long_desc: These days, the DIY, or do-it-yourself crowd is all about creating custom work and one-off exhausts are no exception. Whether you're working on a classic car, race car or just your daily driver, a MagnaFlow universal converter should be the standard building block for your custom exhaust. Each converter is built to last with its ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, as well as a stainless steel body and heat shield that contain a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Another great characteristic of MagnaFlow's universal converters is that each part number covers a wide range of applications so one converter will work on a variety of makes and models. Since these items are universal, some modifications may be involved such as cutting or welding.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.display_name: MagnaFlow Direct Fit California-Approved Catalytic Converters
node.long_desc: MagnaFlow specializes in superior catalytic converter and exhaust technology and has spent the past 30+ years earning its reputation as a global market leader. American engineered and manufactured, MagnaFlow Catalytic Converters combine efficient industrial design to produce a product that exceeds, rather than meets, the highest standards of product performance and efficiency in the industry. MagnaFlow uses both Ceramic and Metallic substrates with different combinations of cell density and wall thickness to meet vehicle specific requirements.;California Residents: WARNING"

MagnaFlow uses both Ceramic and Metallic substrates with different combinations of cell density and wall thickness to meet vehicle specific requirements.

node.display_name: MagnaFlow Exhaust Direct Fit California OBDII Catalytic Converter
node.long_desc: Designed with ease of installation in mind, MagnaFlow's direct-fit converters are the perfect compliment to your OEM exhaust system. With no welding, cutting or bending required, you can easily add one of our direct-fit converters to your vehicle when it's time to replace your original catalytic converter. Whether your original converter has gone bad or you're just looking to upgrade to something more performance oriented, MagnaFlow's direct fit converters are just right. Featuring a ribbed design and funneled inlets and outlets, each converter features a stainless steel body and heat shield and contains a flow efficient, monolithic honeycomb catalyst designed for maximum flow and surface area. Best of all, our 49-state direct-fit converters are in compliance with EPA guidelines so getting a car smog checked is a worry free task.;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Trans4mer; Light Bar; Stainless, Black; Requires Grille Guard Part No. WAR29141;California Residents: WARNING"

node.long_desc: Trans4mer;Front Receiver;Black;Requires Grille Guard Part No.WAR39637;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Of all the WARN mounting systems, the Trans4mer Mounting System offers the most versatility. It can be configured in dozens of different ways to match how you work (or play) with your truck. GRILLE GUARD - The foundation of the Trans4mer System. The grille guard comes with two uprights and two crossbars, and bolts directly to the vehicle frame. It is a required component because it provides the base for all other options. BRUSH GUARDS - Add style and protection with brush guards that complement your vehicle's lines. WINCH CARRIER AND SST CARRIER COVER - Dor a fixed winch mount, you'll need to add the Winch Carrier. You'll also want to take a look at the stainless steel SST Winch Carrier Cover. It bolts over the carrier to give a smooth, contoured and integrated look to the Trans4mer. For a portable winch mounting system, choose the Front Receiver. This 2 Class III Receiver bolts directly to the grille guard in place of the fixed mount winch carrier. LIGHT MOUNTING OPTIONS - For lighting up the night, a light bar, with two mounting tabs, can be easily added to the Trans4mer system. Or for applications with space limitations, Warn Industries makes special L brackets to mount lights from the sides of Grille Guard. POLISHED STAINLESS OR BLACK POWDER COAT FINISH - Whether you choose a Trans4mer system in powder-coated black, stainless steel or a combination, you'll be getting a simple, bolt-on system that installs around the factory bumpers.

node.sales_desc: Spydura synthetic winch rope is constructed of a unique ultra high molecular weight polyethylene material and offers high abrasion resistance and tremendous tensile strength. Coated with high temperature urethane, equipped with a temperature resistant sleeve on the first layer and a ballistic nylon sliding sleeve, Spydura synthetic winch rope provides extreme protection against wear and abrasion. The unique self-tightening rope attachment designed to hold the rope secure on the winch drum makes this exclusive offering from Warn ideal for pushing the limits on the trail.

node.sales_desc: Exhaust spacers are needed for all 2012 and up Jeep JKs using suspension kits with 3IN or more of lift.. The spacers are installed between the driver and passenger head pipe flanges and the flanges of the exhaust cross pipe. This moves the exhaust cross pipe rearward and prevents contact between the front driveshaft and the exhaust cross pipe during suspension down travel.

node.long_desc: Universal Mounting;1.250 inch induction hardened and chrome plated rod;Hardened billet AL6061 piston;2 inch OD skived and burnished seamless tube;CNC machined, laser logo etched anodized aluminum threaded end cap with o-ring air valve;Nitrogen pressurized to 200-psi;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Universal mounting, 4? travel air bump stop provides additional suspension compression control when the suspension is bottoming out, without sacrificing vehicle ride quality. The Pro Comp MX2.0B Air Bump Stop features a 1.250 induction hardened, chrome plated rod with a hardened billet AL6061 piston. The rod and piston are combined with a 2.0? outer diameter skived and burnished seamless tube. The body is zinc plated to provide a protective finish. This emulsion style (Nitrogen gas and hydraulic oil mixed) air bump is filled with a high grade, race quality oil to resist foaming and thermal breakdown and Nitrogen pressurized to 200-PSI. CNC machined, laser logo etched anodized aluminum bump cap and end cap add the finishing touch. The included universal weld-on mount allows for custom mounting of the bump stop on most vehicle applications.

node.long_desc: Developed and tuned specifically for each application;Provides all the great handling characteristics as our monotube shocks in a more affordable package;These shocks are recommended for installations when risk of denting or other impact is probable;Oversized shock bodies with 1.625 inch diameter pistons for maximum control and 11/16 inch chrome shafts for maximum strength;California Residents: WARNING"
node.sales_desc: Rubicon Express twin-tube shocks will help your Jeep reach its full potential--without emptying your wallet! Rubicon packs these oversized shock bodies with 1.625 in. diameter pistons for maximum control and 11/16 in. chrome shafts for maximum strength. They also include rebound stops, multi-lip seals, black urethane bushings, and double-welded rings for durability, making them anything but your typical economy shocks! Plus, since they're not budget-busters, how perfect would they be for the bumps, ruts, rock, and debris of off-roading, where the risk of denting and impact is unavoidable? Twin-tubes are tuned application-specific, so you will have no worries about ride quality when they're paired with your new suspension system. Don't put generic shocks on your Jeep to save money. Choose ones built with your Jeep and your wallet in mind--Rubicon Express twin-tube shocks.
